projectDesc.p: The Göttingen Register of Electronic Texts in Indian Languages (GRETIL) is a resource platform providing standardized machine-readable texts in Indian languages that have been contributed by various individuals and institutions.

correction.p: Apparent errors have been silently corrected.

normalization.p: GRETIL normalizes all texts contributed consistently for each language. Sanskrit texts are normalized in accordance with the scheme of the International Alphabet of Sanskrit Transliteration (IAST) in order to facilitate word search across its corpus without additional transformations.

All characters that were fully equivalent to an IAST-conformant character in the text file contributed have been made to conform to the character list below. Non-conformant characters with additional information including accents, capitalization, and whitespace have been preserved as orig elements inside choice elements with their IAST-conformant equivalent in reg elements for the creation of a plain text. These additional informations will be available only in those transformations of this file that display the original information.

lg.l: mātsaryamīrṣyā kaṭuvākyatā hi pramādasevā viratiḥ śubhācca /
ajñānasevā jaḍa (tā) ca buddheḥ saddharmanāśaḥ priyamaithunatvam /
āhāraśaktiḥ prabalā ca nidrā tiryaggatau ca pravadanti hetum //
śubhañca trividhaṃ kṛtvā sādhavo yānti nirvṛtim //
tasmāt karmaphalaṃ matvā pramādasya ca varjanam /
evaṃ ca tasya dhīrasya dharmadānaratasya ca /
akrodhena hataḥ krodhaḥ kṣamayā krūratā jitā /
pārūṣyaṃ mārdava jitaṃ abaddhaṃ bandhanā jitam //
prāṇātipāto maitryā ca steyaṃ dānaiḥ sadā jitam /
avidyā vidyayā jitā divasena tathā kṣapā /
śāṭhyaṃ na mārdava jitaṃ satyenānṛtiko hataḥ //
siṃhena vijitāḥ sarve mṛgāḥ sattvādhikāśca ye /
santāpena mahecchā ca jitā nityaṃ prakīrtyate //
yo hi deśayate dharma kṣemaṃ nirvāṇagāminam /
chittvā mohamayaṃ pāśaṃ yo hi deśayate śivam /
dharmasya pravaratvam yena dharmeṇa manujāstaranti bhavasāgaram /
saddharmaprabaraḥ prokto na dharmo laukiko hi saḥ //
yo na dharmarato martyaḥ sa paścādanutapyate //
na cittasya vaśaṃ gacchet śatrubhūtaṃ hi tannṛṇām //
dharmeṇa śāmyate cittaṃ jālineva yathā hayaḥ //
saddharmaśravaṇaphalam saddharmaśravaṇaṃ kṛtvā pāpād viramate pumān /
śrutvā bhavati dharmātmā śrutvā pāpaṃ na kurvate /
śrutvā vedayate dharma śrutvā buddhaḥ prasīdati /
śrutvā dharmaṃ vimokṣāya yatate paṇḍito naraḥ //
śrutvā tāṃ jñāyate sarvā pumān śraddhāvibhāvitaḥ //
śrutvā tajjñāyate sarva tasmāt dharmaparo bhavet //
na vyathā śrutamālambya svalpāpi hṛdi jāyate //
dharmeṇa vartate śrutvā duḥkhānmucyeta vai yathā /
śrutvā bhavati maitryātmā tasmācchreyaḥ paraṃ śrutam //
dharmasevanāgrahaḥ yo hi dharma parityajya adharmamanutiṣṭhati /
dharmānusāriṇī śraddhā dharmānusāriṇī śraddhā yathā yāti sukhāvahā /
arthānāṃ netra bhūtā sā daridrāṇāṃ mahadbalam //
śāntapadaprāpteḥ phalam sa hi yattatpadaṃ śāntaṃ nirvāṇamunibhirvṛtam /
na svīkartumayaṃ kāyaḥ kadācit kenacit kṛtaḥ //
kaḥ kāyasya riporartha pāpaṃ kuryād vicakṣaṇaḥ //
jīvitaṃ ca kṣaṇādūrdhvaṃ na gacchati nirūpyate //
kṣaṇe kṣaṇe 'pi kāyo 'yaṃ jīryate na nivartate /
na manuṣyā manuṣyāste yebhyo dharmo na rocate /
kathaṃ prāpya hi mānuṣyaṃ śreyasāmālayaṃ mahat /
sadā tad yāti rabhasaṃ jīvitaṃ sarvadehinām //
śarīre na madaṃ kuryāt kṣaṇike bhaṅgure sadā /
teṣāṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ jñātvā mokṣo bhavati dehinām //
bhramanti cakravannityaṃ na ca vindanti bāliśāḥ //
satkāmajaṃ bhavet saukhyaṃ vinipātagataṃ tu tat /
na hi kāmaviśeṣaṃ ca kiñcid duḥkhavipākajam //
tasmāt kāmeṣu matimān na lubhyet kathañcana /
kṣīyate hi śubhaṃ karma yatasva saha daivataiḥ //
caratastaiḥ śubhaṃ kṣīṇaṃ yatasva saha daivataiḥ //
na śubhaṃ te sadā cīrṇa yatasva saha daivataiḥ //
ye nityaṃ śubhasaṃsaktāḥ kurvanti vā śubhaṃ sadā /
bhuktvā mṛtyuṃ pratīkṣante te janāḥ kāmamohitāḥ /
bhuktvā mṛtyuṃ pratīkṣante te janāḥ kāmamohitāḥ /
ye na karmavipākasya jñānaṃ roṣavadhe ratāḥ //
bhuktvā mṛtyuṃ pratīkṣante te janāḥ kāmamohitāḥ /
bhuktvā mṛtyuṃ pratīkṣante te janāḥ kāmamohitāḥ /
viprayogakṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ ye na paśyanti dāruṇam //
bhuktvā mṛtyuṃ pratīkṣante te janāḥ kāmamohitāḥ /
bhuktvā mṛtyuṃ pratīkṣante te janāḥ kāmamohitāḥ /
bhuktvā mṛtyuṃ pratīkṣante te janāḥ kāmamohitāḥ /
bhuktvā mṛtyuṃ pratīkṣante te janāḥ kāmamohitāḥ /
bhāvitaṃ cetasā yairna na ca tattvapraveśitā //
bhuktvā mṛtyuṃ pratīkṣante te janāḥ kāmamohitāḥ /
bhuktvā mṛtyuṃ pratīkṣante te janāḥ kāmamohitāḥ /
bhuktvā mṛtyuṃ pratīkṣante te janāḥ kāmamohitāḥ /
ye na tattvadhiyo nityaṃ sarvabhūtahite ratāḥ //
bhuktvā mṛtyuṃ pratīkṣante te janāḥ kāmamohitāḥ /
ye śarīra sukhārthena dharma hiṃsanti mohitāḥ //
kṣayaṃ yātaṃ ca yat śīlaṃ spṛṣṭvā yaḥ samupāgataḥ /
vimānāni rathāścaiva harmyāṇi ca tathaiva ca /
yena manye mahad duḥkhaṃ hṛdaye naiva vartate //
kṣaṇe lave muhūrte ca divārātrau tathādhvani /
nirdoṣaṃ hi manaḥ sarvaṃ śāntaṃ bhavati nityaśaḥ //
kṣayāntaṃ hi sukhaṃ sarva na sukhaṃ vidyate dhruvam /
(na bālaṃ na yuvānaṃ vā) na sthavirameva vā /
sukhitaṃ duḥkhitaṃ vāpi guṇavantaṃ tathaiva ca /
daivaṃ vā nārakaṃ vāpi tiryañca pratajaṃ tathā /
yad duḥkhaṃ cyavamānasya devalokāt surasya ca /
yad duḥkhaṃ cyavamānasya tasyaupamyaṃ na vidyate //
patanāntaṃ sadā saukhyaṃ nāsti lokasya nityajāḥ /
tad buddhvā kāraṇaṃ sarva śreyase kriyatāṃ manaḥ //
jātasya maraṇaṃ nityaṃ na tasyāstīti nityatā /
kṣayāntaṃ hi sukhaṃ sarva yo na vindati mohadhīḥ /
kuśalaṃ kārya(karaṇaṃ kuśalī ca) priyaḥ sadā /
cyavamānasya ca yadduḥkhaṃ devalokāt surasya hi //

body.p: abhiyāti sadā janma tvaritaṃ yāti yauvanam /

lg.l: sā bhūmistāni padmāni vanāni vividhāni ca //
harmyāgrāṇi ca ramyāṇi ratnavanti mahānti ca //
sukhaṃ sarvasya devasya tṛṣṇayā vañcitasya hi /
sa vināśya janaṃ sarva bhrāmayitvā bhavārṇave //
kālānalena nirdagdhā kva te devagaṇāḥ gatāḥ /
devāsurā narā yakṣā narake yānti jaṅgamāḥ //
anena hi yathā devāḥ śataśo 'tha sahastraśaḥ //
na vindanti dhruvaṃ mṛtyuṃ dehināṃ sahajasthitam /
kālapāśena baddhasya trātāro na bhavanti te /
rajasā guṇṭhitaṃ vaktraṃ ātmano naiva vindati //
ayaṃ tavāgraho duḥkhaṃ mṛtyunā preṣito mahān //
tarṣyayā tṛṣṇayā mūḍhāḥ patanti vivaśā bhuvi //
jātyā jātyā dhruvaṃ mṛtyuścārogye sati ruk sthitā /
sarvaiḥ priyairviyogaśca na saṃyogo dhruvaṃ sthitaḥ //
jātau satyāṃ yathā mṛtyuravaśyaṃ sthita eva hi /
kṣīyate sukṛtaṃ karma āyūṃṣi kṣaṇikāni hi //
naśyanti sarvadā sarvā mā pramāde manaḥkṛthā /
na nityaṃ labhyate svargo na nityaṃ kṣaṇasampadā //
(tasya jāte hi patane tat prayogo vṛthā bhavet) //
devalokād yathā devāḥ patanti narake punaḥ //
na tacchakyaṃ pramatte syāt tadduḥkhaṃ paramaṃ kaṭu //
na ca devāḥ prapaśyadhvaṃ maraṇāntaṃ hi jīvitam //
na devā na narā yakṣā nāsurā garuḍāstathā /
tāvattu sukṛtaṃ kārya mā paścāt paritapyatha //
kiṃ kariṣyanti saukhyāni kiṃ striyaḥ kiñcabāndhavāḥ /
vyatīte tu ṛtau sarve pratiyānti yathāgatāḥ //
yathā kāle samutpanne modante sukṛtaiḥ surāḥ /
vyatīte tu śubhe kāle pratiyānti yathāgatāḥ //
vyatīte tu śubhe kāle śīryate tat samantataḥ //
śīryate satataṃ saukhyaṃ nāsaukhyaṃ vidyate dhruvam //
tathā saukhyamidaṃ sarva gacchati na nivartate //
barhiṇāṃ ca yathā nādo vāyunā samudīritaḥ /
yathā hi jvalane kṣiptaṃ dhruvaṃ kālaṃ pradahayate /
yathā yathā mahāsaukhyaṃ svayaṃ bhogo yathā yathā /
tathā tathā mahad duḥkhaṃ patanāntodbhavaṃ dhruvam //
jātirduḥkhā jarā duḥkhā maraṇaṃ duḥkhameva ca /
ekasya patanaṃ dṛṣṭvā kathaṃ nodvijate janaḥ /
yaḥ paśyati bhayaṃ dūrāt pratipattau ca vartate /
patanāntaṃ hi maraṇaṃ patamāno yathā giriḥ /
taṃ jñātvā mā pramādeṣu stubadhvaṃ devasattamāḥ /
saṃśleṣayati viśleṣaṃ yauvane ca sadā jarā //
jīvite ca sadā mṛtyuḥ padametat sadā sthitam /
na tadasti bhavet kiñcid yad jñānaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ calam //
yannityaṃ (ca) sukhaṃ vā syādetatsthānaṃ na vidyate /
kṣīyate ca tathā saukhyaṃ na ca buddhayantyamedhasaḥ /
jīyate bata kālo 'yaṃ kṣaṇikaṃ ca yathā sukham //
jarā jātivipattīnāṃ yo na mūḍho viṣīdati //
yathā hi yad vināśāntaṃ tathaiṣāmapi jīvitam //
nānyat trāṇamṛte dharmāt tasmād dharmarato bhavet /
mṛtyukāle samutpanne na kaścit kasyacit tathā //
na ca gacchantimapyekaṃ padamekaṃ hi gacchati /
yadā te cyavanaṃ prāpte bhavabhogakaraṃ param //
tadā vindati mūḍhātmā yad bhayaṃ mṛtyujaṃ mahat /
na vindanti sadā devāścyavanānte mahad bhayam /
na mātaro na pitaro na mitrāṇi na bāndhavāḥ //
na janaḥ svajanaśceha trātā bhavati kasyacita //
tvaritaṃ yāti janmedaṃ na ca vindati bāliśaḥ //
yadi duḥkhādbhayaṃ tvaritaṃ yadi mṛtyubhayaśca yaḥ //
sarvadevakṛtaṃ saukhyaṃ na ca vindanti mohitāḥ /
abhūtvā ca cyavantyete bhūtvāvaśyaṃ hi cañcalāḥ //
na paśyanti surāstīvraṃ vyasanāntaṃ hi jīvitam /
tasmāt tadubhayaṃ jñātvā śreyase kriyatāṃ manaḥ /
surūpaṃ vā virūpaṃ vā balavantaṃ tathābalam //
rājānaṃ vā tathā mṛtyuḥ gṛhiṇaṃ vā tathā yatim //
nirdhanaṃ vā daridraṃ vā saguṇaṃ nirguṇaṃ tathā //
pravāsinaṃ gṛhasthaṃ vā jale vāpi sthalesthitam //
jāgarantaṃ tathā suptaṃ bhuñjānaṃ vā tathā sthitam //
caṇḍaṃ suśīlinaṃ cāpi kadarya dhaninaṃ tathā //
nārakeyaṃ tathā pretaṃ tiryañco manujaṃ tathā //
kāmadhātau ca ye devā rūpadhātau ca ye sthitāḥ //
yad jātaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ kiñcid tad vināśāntameva hi /
tannāsti saṃskṛtaṃ kiñcid yasya nāśo ca vidyate /
sudāntaṃ kriyatāṃ cittaṃ yenedaṃ bhrāmyate jagat /
rabhasaṃ jīvitaṃ saukhyaṃ prayāti khalu dehinām //
na ca vindanti vibudhā jātyandhā iva satpatham /
yathā kālaṃ samāpadya bhavanti sukhitāḥ surāḥ //
punastamaiva saṃsṛtya patanti vivaśā hi te /
sukhaṃ vrajati duḥkhaṃ hi kālasya vaśamāgataḥ /
tadidaṃ bhuñjate svargaṃ kṣīyate ca tataḥ punaḥ /
ye bhāvāḥ saṃskṛtā nityāḥ sarve te vipralobhinaḥ //
kṣaṇikaṃ jīvitaṃ sarva na ca vindanti bāliśāḥ /
nāyurdhruvaṃ bhavatyeva na saukhyaṃ triṣu dhātuṣu //
na (ca) vindanti vivaśā devāḥ kāmena mohitāḥ /
acintyārthe saukhyamidaṃ na ca vindanti bāliśāḥ /
vāteritaṃ tu yat saukhyaṃ vināśāntaṃ bhaviṣyati //
tathā saukhyamidaṃ sarva tasmāt tat parivarjayet /
ādau madhye tathā cānte narakāya bhaviṣyati //
sarva ca saṃskṛtaṃ saukhyaṃ nanu bhaṭṭārameva tat //
sukhaṃ ca jīvitaṃ sarva tasmāt tat parivarjayet //
ādau madhye tathā cānte śreyasyeva manaḥ sadā /
na ca cintayataḥ kāle viṣaye vipralobhinaḥ //
pādapān devagān sattvān na ca buddhayantyacakṣuṣaḥ //
yad duḥkhaṃ sukaraṃ tasya naupamyamiha vidyate //
tathā tathā mahad duḥkhaṃ cyavamānasya duḥsaham //
kṛtvā hi saṃskṛtaṃ karma na jñātvā karmaṇaḥ sthitiḥ /
viditvā kaḥ pumān āsthāṃ kuryātsopadrave bhave //
mṛtyuḥ pivati bhūtāni jarā pivati yauvanam //
vyādhiḥ pivati cārogyaṃ na ca loko 'vabudhyate /
na kṣaṇo 'sti muhūrto vā parivartastathāpi vā //
anityaṃ jīvitaṃ sarva na vilambi ca yauvanam //
yāsyanti vilayaṃ sarve na ca loko 'vabudhyate /
kṣayaṃ prayāti śīghraṃ ca na ca loko 'vabudhyate /
sarvasya sarvathā sarvo vināśo niyato bhave //
na sarvaḥ sarvathā sarva sarvopāyaiḥ prayatnaśaḥ /
sa eva dhā(ta)ve śīghraṃ vinipātāya dehinām /
śreyase kriyatāṃ yatno mā pramādeḥ manaḥ kṛthāḥ //
yathā (hi śīghra) gamanaṃ pakṣiṇāṃ pavanasya vā /
jīvitaṃ yanniruddhaṃ tu tasya nāgamanaṃ punaḥ //
avaśyambhāvi viśleṣaṃ na ca vindanti devatāḥ //
na vindanti mahad duḥkhaṃ yadavaśyaṃ bhaviṣyati //
pramādino hi yad devāḥ nūnamete ca cetanāḥ //
sa paṇḍita iti jñeyo viparītastu bāliśaḥ //
kṣaṇe kṣaṇe vivardhante lobhāśā mohite jane /
na ca vindanti saṃsārāḥ kṣīyamāṇāḥ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe //
abhyeti na ca mūḍho 'yaṃ lokaṃ paśyati bāliśaḥ /
sarve tena bhaviṣyanti tvaṃ tu saṅgena bādhyase /
na śaktāścyavane kṣāntaṃ balaṃ tasya tathāgatam //
yathā viṣaṃ tathā vahniḥ pramādaḥ prāṇināṃ tathā /
pramādonmāditāḥ satvāḥ duḥkhād duḥkhaṃ prayānti te //
prayānti paramāṃ śānti pramādo yatra nāsti hi //
saubhāgyaṃ prāpya yo martyaḥ pramādeṣu ca vartate /
na pramādasya kālo hi harṣasya na kathañcana /
phale prāpte pramādo 'yaṃ paścāt santapyate vyathā //
tathā ca kuśalaṃ prāyo yaḥ pramādaṃ na sevate //
duḥkhaṃ yasya bhavediṣṭaṃ sa pramādaṃ niṣevatām /
tiraścāṃ hi surāṇāṃ ca viśeṣo naiva vidyate //
sannikṛṣṭaṃ sadā duḥkhaṃ patanaṃ vā bhaviṣyati /
sa paścād vigate tasmin pratyādeśena rakṣyate //
na teṣāṃ viśvased vīro yasmāt svapnopamā hi te //
na svapno narake hetuḥ kāmāḥ svapnasya hetukāḥ /
tasmāt kāmamimaṃ muktvā nityaṃ sucaritaṃ caret //

body.p: tejasā hi tathā mūlairagninā na ca kathyate /

lg.l: muhayante yena te bālāḥ prayānti narakaṃ punaḥ //
paścād vahanti virasaṃ patanāntaṃ sukhaṃ calam //
pramādena tu ye muktā (ste) tīrṇāsti bhavārṇavāt //
na rātrau na divā tasya śubhaṃ bhavati karhicit //
yat sukhaṃ laukikaṃ kiñcid yacca lokottaraṃ matam /
naśyate tat pramādena tasmāt tat parivarjayet //
apramādena te devāḥ devānāṃ śreṣṭhatāṃ gatāḥ //
icchate yatsukhaṃ nityaṃ yaśca duḥkhād vibheti (vai) /
prapātaṃ hi prapadyante janāḥ śukla kṛtātmakāḥ //
apramādaḥ paraṃ śreyo na pramādaḥ kathañcanaḥ /
pramādamūḍhā hi narā bhūyo madyena mohitā /
jātamātrasya devasya tat kṣaṇaṃ kṣīyate sukham /
atṛptāḥ kāmabhogeṣu sukhena sukhitā hi ca //
na vindanti balaṃ sarva vināśāntaṃ hi jīvitam //
sa paścād vyasane prāpte budhyate tasya tatphalam //
mitravad dṛśyate pūrva paścād bhavati śatruvat /
pramādaḥ kāraṇaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ sarvānnarthān karoti saḥ //
maithune bhojane caiva yeṣāṃ buddhiḥ sadāratāḥ //
patanti vṛkṣavad devā gatyāṃ gatyāṃ pṛthak pṛthak //
śataśo na hutaścaiva divi jātā divaukasaḥ /
na ca saṃvegajanito hṛdi śokaḥ prajāyate //
sulabdhaṃ mānuṣaṃ janma ye labdhvā apramādinaḥ /
durlabhaṃ mānuṣaṃ karma labdhvāpi ye pramādinaḥ /
te pramādāt paribhrāntāḥ patanti narake narāḥ //
na tathā dahyate vahnirna ca śastraṃ vikṛntati /
sukharūpaṃ tathā duḥkhaṃ mitrarūpaṃ tathā ripuḥ /
trayaste ripavaḥ kruṣṭāḥ nāśayanti sukhaṃ nṛṇām //
ye pramādaratā nityaṃ na ca dharmaratā budhāḥ /
pramādaṃ viṣavad ye tu parirakṣanti paṇḍitāḥ /
tasmāt sukhārthināḥ nityaṃ mā pramāde matiṃ kṛthāḥ //
pramādasevakā ye tu te sarve nidhanaṃgatā //
kṣāntiścāpi sadā yuktā dayā bhūteṣu sarvadā //
evaṃ matvā sadā devo yaḥ pramādena rakṣati /
yathā yathā hi santoṣaḥ sevyate yatibhiḥ sadā /
tathā tathā hi nirvāṇamanike tasya vartate //
narāṇāṃ paśya manaso nityaṃ vyāpārameva ca /
mṛtaḥ sa naro bhavati yaḥ pramādavihāravān /
mṛtyuṃ ca varjayed doṣaṃ pramādaṃ duḥkhamūlakam //
nityaṃ pramuditā devāḥ nityaṃ pramuditā vayam /
pakṣiṇāṃ ca surāṇāṃ ca viśeṣo nopalabhyate //
na dharmācaraṇaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ mokṣacaryā na yātyasau /
tathaiva yadi devānāṃ te gatāḥ pakṣibhiḥ samā //
ye pramādavinirmuktā ye ca dharmaratāḥ sadā /
te devāḥ satpathā loke na pramādavihāriṇaḥ //
devānāṃ ca khagānāṃ ca viśeṣo nopalabhyate //
na dharmapatitaḥ kaścid jātyā bhavati śobhanaḥ //
te devāḥ sammattā loke na pramādavicāriṇaḥ //
te devā na tu ye saktāḥ kāmeṣu hitakāriṣu //
ye nodvijanti saṃsāre te devāḥ pakṣibhiḥ samāḥ //
jīryate madyapānaṃ hi pramādo naiva jīryate //
ye tu pramādavaśagāste bhavanti khagā narāḥ //
yastu dūrāt pramādena bhayaṃ nāvaiti durmatiḥ /
patanaṃ devalokāt te dānai rakṣanti dāruṇam /
tad vicintya pramādaste na saṃsevyaḥ kathañcana //
ye pramādaratā nityaṃ na te saukhyasya bhāginaḥ /
durgatīnāṃ paraṃ mārgaḥ pramāda iti kathyate //
yeṣāṃ bhayaṃ na duḥkhaṃ (ca) na ca jñānāvalokanam /
sā ratiryadi devānāṃ te gatāḥ paśubhiḥ samāḥ //
śatruṇā saha rakṣanti jñāne pariharanti ca /
nikṛntanti sadā doṣā na pramādaṃ pariṣvajet //
(a) pramādācca yat saukhyaṃ śāśvataṃ sa bhayaṃ hi tat //
yattu tasmād vinirmuktaṃ tat saukhyaṃ dhruvamacyutam /
saṃsāro bhramate duḥkhe tat pramādasya ceṣṭitam /
tathā me hita māstheyaṃ yathā yat syāt (sukhāvaham) /
ye devā yacca tatsaukhyaṃ paśyan yadapikiñcana //
tat sarva (hi) dhruvaṃ gatvā saṃskṛtasyaiṣa sambhavaḥ /
avaśyaṃ te vinaśyanti ye bhāvāḥ saṃskṛtāścalāḥ //
devo vā puruṣaścāpi na sukhasyāntike hi saḥ /
mṛtaḥ sa puruṣo nityaṃ yo madyena pramādyati //
kāmena mohitā devā madyenāpi tathaiva ca //
na tattvamatra paśyanti jātyandhā iva satpatham /
mārga ca viṣasaṃspṛṣṭaṃ sarvathā naiva paśyati /
tasmāt te patitā bhūyo ye pramādānusevinaḥ /
na laukikeṣu kāryeṣu kuto na śraiyaseṣu ca //
tadā pramādasya phalaṃ jñāsyanti kaṭukaṃ hi tat /
yuktaṃ ca (hi) sadā sevyaṃ varjanīyaṃ ca duṣkṛtam //
pramādaṃ ca madaṃ jahayāt pramāda (vi)rato bhavet /
tad vicintya sadā dhīraḥ sukhaṃ sucaritaṃ caret //
pramādaḥ śreyasāṃ nāśaḥ pramādo bandhanaṃ param //
yaiḥ pramādaḥ parityaktaḥ prāptaṃ taiḥ padamacyutam //
pramattaḥ puruṣaḥ sarvaḥ sonmāda iva lakṣyate //
hetau karmavipāke ca mṛtyūtpattau tathaiva ca /
ye pramādaṃ vinirjitya nityaṃ jñānaratā narāḥ /
te kleśabandhanaṃ chitvā padaṃ yātāḥ sukhodayam //
bhramanti vibhave sattvā mā pramādeṣu rakṣathaḥ //
sukhī bhavati duḥkhī vai duḥkhitaścāpi sukhitaḥ /
bhartāpi tṛpto bhavati mā pramādeṣu rakṣathaḥ //
mātā pitā vā bhavati bhāryā mātṛtvameva ca /
eṣa panthāḥ śivaḥ śreṣṭho yaḥ pramādavivarjitaḥ /
tena mārgeṇa satataṃ nirvāṇaṃ yānti paṇḍitāḥ //
aneka puruṣaḥ kṣipto nātmano vindate hitam /
pramādopahatā mūḍhā nṛtyanti ca hasanti ca //
utpannāvicyutāḥ mārgāt kṣāntiṃ ye nāśayanti ca /
mārgāmārga na vindanti jātyandhena surāḥ samāḥ //
dhyānebhyo yaddhi patanaṃ tat pramādasya ceṣṭitam //
traidhātukamidaṃ kṛtsnaṃ na ca buddhayantya cetasaḥ //
na bhūyaḥ khedamāyāti tat pramādasya ceṣṭitam //
anarthā hi trayo loke yairidaṃ naśyate jagat /
strīśleṣo madyapānaṃ ca krīḍā ca viṣayaiḥ saha /
tasmāt pramādo na nareṇa sevyaḥ, sa durgatīnāṃ prathamāgrameva /
vihāya taṃ duḥkhasahastrayoniṃ, prayānti buddhā bhavapāragrayam //
na kāmeṣu ratiṃ kuryāt kāmāḥ paramavañcakāḥ /
atṛptirasmāt kāmāste na sukhā nāpi śāśvatāḥ /
na rāgavaśagā ye tu na teṣāṃ narakād bhayam //
kāṣṭhavad dahyate tena na ca dṛśyo janasya saḥ //
yathā yathā hi prabalo rāgāgnistapyate mahān /
nādye nānte na madhye ca nāsmiṃlloke na cāpare /
tadeva yadi devānāṃ khagaiḥ syuste samāḥ surāḥ //
na tu dṛṣṭiḥ samudrasya rūpārthaistṛptirasti hi //
mādyante bahumohāndhā na ca buddhayanti bāliśāḥ /
ādau cānte tathā kāmāstasmāt kāmān vivarjayet //
yathā yathā hi sevyante vivardhante tathā tathā /
evaṃ doṣaṃ sadā jñātvā dhīraḥ kāmān vivarjayet /
tathā kāmāḥ sadā varjyā hetavo narakasya te //
na dṛṣṭo na śrutaḥ kaścid yaḥ kāmavaśagaḥ pumān /
na kāmairvipralabdhaḥ syānna ca duḥkhena pīḍitaḥ //
ahantvāttu bhavet prītirna sā kāmaiḥ kathañcana //
yā tu kāmavinirmuktā sā ratiḥ pari(bhāṣitā) //
tāṃ samāśritya gacchanti yoginaḥ paramāṃ gatim /
āpātaramyā madhurā madhye ramyā ca sarvadā /
tāṃ vyudasya kathaṃ bālā rakṣante (kāmajāṃ ratim) //
kathaṃ sā sevyate bālairyā na dṛṣṭā sukhāvahā //
dāhena ca prarohaḥ syāt tadvat kāmakṛtā ratiḥ //
pataṅgaḥ paśyati hyagni dāhadoṣaṃ na paśyati /
yastu rāgakṛto dāhaḥ pacyate kāmināṃ sadā /
tasmāt kāma(viṣaṃ) tyaktvā nityaṃ jīvatha he surāḥ /
taṃ hitvā narakaṃ yānti kāmamohena vañcitāḥ //
tathā viṣātmakamidaṃ sukhaṃ bhuṅkte hi mohitaḥ //
jīveyuḥ pāmarāḥ kecit viṣaṃ pītvāpi durbhagāḥ /
na tyājyaṃ vyasane mūḍha yad paśyasi bhaviṣyati //
bhramanti bhramitāḥ kāmairna paśyanti mahad bhayam //
labdhā naṣṭā punaḥ kāmā na teṣāṃ viścaset pumān //
rāgeṇa rañjitāḥ pūrvaṃ dveṣeṇa ca tiraskṛtāḥ /
kāmena vañcitāḥ sattvāḥ kāmena ca vimohitāḥ /
tadetad vyasanaṃ sattvāḥ svahite kriyatāṃ manaḥ /
tṛṣṇāpi tṛptijanikā mano naiva hi tṛpyati //
ramante vibudhāḥ sarve tat sarvaṃ mohaceṣṭitam //
na ca vindanti yad duḥkhaṃ viprayogo bhaviṣyati //
satṛṣṇasya tathā tṛptiḥ kāmebhyo naiva jāyate //
paścāttu vyasane prāpte jānīte yasya tat phalam //
na vidanti mahad duḥkhaṃ yadavaśyaṃ bhaviṣyati //
sa paścād vyasane prāpte mūḍho 'sau vipralapyate //
yacca kāmasukhaṃ loke yacca tṛṣṇodbhavaṃ sukham /
na sukhī vartate tāvadya yasya kāmo hṛdi sthitaḥ /
sevyamānāḥ sadā kāmā vardhante ca muhurmuhuḥ /
na ca teṣāṃ parityāgaṃ kurvanti viṣayotsavāḥ //
śabdaiḥ kāntaiḥ sumadhuraiḥ śrotrameti na tarpaṇam /
na tṛptirasti devānāṃ gajānāṃ vai tṛṇairyathā /
tairayaṃ dahyate loko na ca vindatyabuddhimān /
tasmād varaṃ vicakṣuḥ syānna tu kāmavaśo naraḥ /
na jñānaṃ nāpi vijñānaṃ vidyate kāmacāriṇām //
tathā saukhyagataṃ nṛṇāṃ sarvathā na vivartate //
yo na tṛpyati kāmeṣu sa naro 'dhamagāmikaḥ //
rūpeṣu rakṣyate nityaṃ pariṇāme ca vidyate //
tāni caiva kathaṃ devāḥ śakṣyante kāmagocare //
tathāpi kāmatṛṣṇā yā na sā jāti vilakṣaṇā /
evaṃ sukhābhivṛddhā ca na vitṛpyati devatā //
ākāśasya yathā nānto vidyate nāpi saṃśayaḥ /
evaṃ kāmeṣu nāstyantaḥ kāmināṃ nāsti saṃkṣayaḥ //
tapyate viṣaye tasmāt paraṃ kāmo na śakyate //
tyajanti vyasane prāptā vipadyante hi te narāḥ //
ye vā tṛiptikarā dṛṣṭāstān buddhvā (tu) vivarjayet //
viṣayaiśca bhavet sarva jātau jātau prajāyate //
viṣayāḥ śatrubhūtā hi na vaśyante kathañcana //
kāmabaddhāḥ sadā mohabāliśā vā bhavanti te /
na tyajanti kathaṃ mūḍhā mohitāḥ svena karmaṇā //
paścād bhavati nāśāya sukhaṃ tadvadidaṃ nṛṇām //
na tṛptā na ca tṛpyanti na ca tṛptirbhaviṣyati /
viṣayaiḥ sarvadevānāṃ tasmāt kāmo na śāntaye //
samprāpte mṛtyukāle ca na śamāyāsya vidyate //
jānīyādadya me devā yad duḥkhaṃ viprayogajam /
muhūrtamapi kāmeṣu na kuryāt tatra saṃsthitim //
viṣayeṣu na rakṣyante teṣāṃ duḥkhamiva sthitam /
sattvā avidyayā mugdhā nityaṃ duḥkhasya bhoginaḥ /
anyathā viṣavad vijñaḥ kāmeṣu ca prasahyate /
yathā yathā hi sevyante vardhante te tathā tathā /
vañcayitvā janaṃ mūḍhaṃ śāṭī kṛtyeva bandhanam /
athavā ye na gacchanti yatsukhāt sukhamuttamam //
nirvāṇagāmino nāsti vinā muktyā kutaḥ sukham? /
atṛptau ca kutaḥ śarma sarvathā sampraveśate //
na kāmabandhanestṛptāḥ kāmajaṃ nidhanaṃ hi tat /
yatra bhāsayate pāpād yatra śāntiḥ sukhāvahā /
tat kevalaṃ mahājñānaṃ kathyate nidhanaṃ dhanam //
ye prasaktā na kāmeṣu tṛṣṇayā na pralobhitāḥ /
tṛptirnāsti sadā kāmairna kāmāḥ śāntaye smṛtāḥ /
te kevalaṃ praṇaṣṭā hi narakāgni pradarśakāḥ //
yo na muhyati saukhyeṣu sa 'dhīra' iti kathyate //
na ca vindanti mūḍhā ye mohena parivañcitāḥ //
tasmāt kāmaṃ parityajya krodhaṃ nirvāsya paṇḍitaḥ /
śatruvad viṣayā jñeyā nirvāṇaṃ caiva mitravat /

yaḥ kāmapaṅkoddhṛtavānadoṣaḥ
sarveṣu sattveṣu sadā sukhārthī /
śārīraṃ mānasaṃ dāhaṃ tṛṣṇāgniḥ kurute nṛṇām //
lobhāśīviṣadaṣṭā ye teṣāṃ śarma na vidyate /
na teṣāṃ bhavajaṃ duḥkhaṃ svapne samupavidyate //
tatra tatra viṣaṃ yāti tathā tṛṣṇāviṣaṃ nṛṇām //
tasmāt tṛṣṇā vimoktavyā yadi saukhyaṃ hi rocate //
tathā tathā sukhaṃ prāpya tṛṣṇāgnirvardhate nṛṇām /
te gatāḥ paramāṃ śāntiṃ yān hi tṛṣṇā na bādhate /
tasmāt tṛṣṇāṃ na seveta sā hi tṛṣṇā durāsadā //
tṛṣṇayāḥ toṣitā devāḥ patanti narakaṃ punaḥ /
satṛṣṇasya vitarkā ye teṣāṃ saṃkhyā na vidyate //
jālinī bādhate nityaṃ yathā badhnanti dehinaḥ /
tṛṣṇānadīṣu viṣame vahanti na ca gocare //
gāhante te ca sammūḍhāḥ surā rāgeṇa vañcitāḥ /
tṛṣṇānalaḥ suragaṇān dahate na ca te viduḥ /
na kṣaṇo nāpi hi lavo na muhūrta kathañcana //
tathā prapañcitā devā yathā na śubhabhāginaḥ //
sukhaṃ prāpnuvanti nityaṃ ye na tṛṣṇāvaśānugāḥ /
animitte mano yeṣāṃ visṛṣṭā ye ca tṛṣṇayā /
na rātrau na divā teṣāṃ hṛdayaṃ suprasīdati //
bibheti hi naraḥ sarvaḥ sarpādiva viṣendhanāt /
te mṛtā narakaṃ yānti pretayoniṃ tathaiva ca /
buddhimantaḥ sadā santaḥ te gatāḥ paramāṃ gatim /
kriyamāṇo dhruvaṃ loko vardhate sa muhurmuhuḥ //
yacca tatsambhavaṃ yogāt tat sarva na vinaśyati //
tena vittena lobhātmā nīyate narakaṃ bhṛśam /
anyaistadbhujyate vittaṃ sa tu pāpena lipyate //
na lobhaṃ saṃśrayet prājño lobhāgnirdahyate sadā //
vipadantā hi sampattiḥ kṣayāntaṃ divasaṃ yathā /
yathā tiṣṭhati sampattiḥ vipattiḥ pāpikā tathā //
yasyeṣṭāḥ sampado nityaṃ sukhaṃ cābhimataṃ sadā //
jani nāśayate tāsāṃ tṛṣṇā naṣṭā sukhāvahā /
sukṛtāni ca naśyanti tṛṣṇā naiva vinaśyati /
bhave bhave gatā satvāḥ na vindanti śubhāśubham //
na tasyāṃ viśvased dhīmān saṃsārabandhanā hi sā //
na tasyāṃ viśvaset prājñaḥ sā hi lokasya bandhanam //
na rātrau na divā tasya sukhaṃ bhavati lobhinaḥ //
pāpāni hi ca karmāṇi kurvanti puruṣāḥ kṣitau /
ye sāhasaṃ na kurvanti viśanti jvalanaṃ ca yat /
viśanti (vai) narā mūḍhā lobhastatra hi kāraṇam //
eṣa panthāḥ śivaḥ śreṣṭho yena tṛṣṇā vaśīkṛtā //
svahite ye na niratāḥ kutasteṣāṃ bhavet sukham //
strīvināśo vināśo drāgiha loke paratra ca //
rāgeṇa saha jāyante nityaṃ vai dāruṇāḥ striyaḥ /
dānena saha jāyante yathā loke hutāśanāḥ //
na bhavet tādṛśo dāho yo 'yaṃ vahnisamudbhavaḥ /
nopakāraṃ smarantyetā na kuśalaṃ nāpi vikramam /
bhavanti sampado yatra rakṣyante yatra yoṣitaḥ /
yaṃ yaṃ gacchanti puruṣaṃ rakṣyante tatra yoṣitaḥ /
śīghraṃ śīghraṃ naraṃ hyetāstyajanti puruṣaṃ sthitam //
yathā hi bhramarī puṣpaṃ śuṣkaṃ tyajati sarvadā /
tathā vittena rahitaṃ puruṣaṃ tyajati priyā //
devānāṃ bandhanaṃ nāma yathā strībandhanaṃ matam /
etadagraṃ hi rāgāṇāṃ yo rāgaḥ strīsamudbhavaḥ /
viśvāsya viṣaye puruṣaṃ bad dhvā priyamanekaśaḥ /
na yāyājjātu viśvāsaṃ pumān dhīreṇa cetasā //
tā bhavantaṃ parityajya punaranyaṃ tato gatāḥ //
nopakāraṃ na satkāraṃ na priyāṇi na santatim /
mlānaṃ puṣpaṃ yathā tyaktvā bhramaro 'nyatra dhāvati /
tathā hi vyasane prāpte tyajanti khalu yoṣitaḥ //
bhavanti yoṣitaḥ sarvā viṣamiśraṃ yathā madhu //
ābhirvimohitāḥ kiṃ vā raṃjitāḥ puruṣāḥ svataḥ /
na kurvanti hitaṃ vākyaṃ yathā muṣṇikagāmikam //
na kaścit pāśapāśo 'yaṃ hṛtpāśo yoṣitaḥ param /
mūrtimān badhyate kāyaḥ pāśena mahatā tathā /
pāśena baddhāḥ puruṣā na mucyante bhavārṇavāt //
ṣaḍindriyāṇi badhnāti pāśo yaḥ strīmayo mahān /
pāśastu kāyamevaikaṃ kaścit badhnāti vā na vā //
bandhanaṃ na dṛḍhaṃ hīdaṃ mokṣavārya ṣaḍāyasam /
nānāvidheṣu puṣpeṣu yathā carati ṣaṭ padaḥ /
vāyvākāśānalā yadvan na śaktā grathituṃ naraiḥ /
cāpalyaṃ sahajaṃ strīṇāṃ bhāskarasya yathā prabhā //
vairañca śāśvataṃ tāsāmaśmanāṃ ca yathā vraṇaiḥ //
puṣpacchatro yathā sarpo bhasmacchatro yathā nalaḥ /
viṣavṛkṣe yathā puṣpaṃ dṛṣṭiramyaṃ na śāntaye /
naro na sukhabhogāya (haya) smilloke na cāpare //
nāgninā na ca śastreṇa na balena na jantubhiḥ /
strīmayaṃ bandhanaṃ hetuḥ śakyate na durāsadam //
tathā striyo hi rakṣanti viṣamārtha tyajanti ca //
devaṃ samīkṣya capalāḥ striyo naiva prabhāvikāḥ //
yathā sthirā bhūmiriyaṃ yathā vāyuḥ sadā calaḥ //
tathā strīṇāṃ kṛtaṃ nāsti doṣamayyaḥ sadā smṛtāḥ /
tyajanti vyasane prāpte śuṣkaṃ sara ivāśugāḥ /
girīṇāṃ gamanaṃ nāsti strīṇāṃ naivāsti sauhṛdam /
bhaved vajramayī mṛdvī tyajed (rātrau yathā) ravim //
sukheṣu samatāṃ yānti vyasaneṣu tyajanti ca //
saṃprāpte vyasane tīvre striya paribhavanti hi /
svalpaiḥ parājitaṃ kṛtvā kāmasya vaśagāḥ striyaḥ /
yadi śīlalavaḥ kaścit strīṇāṃ manasi vartate /
cireṇa dahate vahniḥ sa spṛṣṭāḥ pavaneritaḥ //
tasmāt striyo vivarjyāḥ syuḥ yadicchet sukhamuttamam //
etat sarva paraṃ loke nārīṇāṃ varjanaṃ sadā /
ya icchati nivṛttiṃ tu sa naraḥ strīṃ vivarjayet /
pāpasevī sumṛṣṭāśī naro bhadraṃ na paśyati /
udyukto vīryavān dhīro dhārmikaḥ strīṃ vivarjayet /
madyapānaṃ na seveta madyaṃ hi viṣamuttamam /
yaḥ sevate sadā madyaṃ tasya buddhirasaṃsthitā /
madyakṣipto hi puruṣo jīvannapi mṛto mataḥ /
ya icchejjīvitaṃ saukhyaṃ sa madyaṃ varjayet sadā //
madyena narakaṃ yānti pretalokaṃ tathaiva ca /
na jñānaṃ nāpi vijñānaṃ na kāryāṇi na ca kriyām /
abhyāse madhuraṃ madyaṃ vipāke paramaṃ kaṭu /
na madye viśvaseddhīmān naraṃ vakṣyati māmiti /
sampattau vyasanaṃ madyaṃ devānāṃ tu viśeṣataḥ /
yathā yathā sukhā prītistannāśe vyasanaṃ tathā //
madyaṃ mohamayaṃ pāna pītvā kālena coditāḥ /
nākāt pratyakṣanarakaṃ tasmāt madyaṃ na saṃspṛśet //
darśanāt sparśanāt pānāta madyaṃ mohayate naram /
tasmāt sa madyapānaṃ ca dūrataḥ parivarjayet //
tasmādādīnavo jñeyaḥ sa hi tad varjayet sadā //
pītaṃ janayate mohaṃ mohāt pāpeṣu rakṣyate /
tṛṭ chedaṃ kurute cāsau paścāddāhaṃ sudāruṇam //
tasmāt sa puruṣo dhīro yo madyaṃ nānusevate //
yaistu tad virasaṃ pītaṃ pītaṃ tāmra (ka) lohitam //
naikāṅgitā hi cittasya na dharmāṇāṃ vicāraṇā /
naṣṭadharmasya sattvasya nāyaṃ loko na cāparaḥ //
īryyāpathaṃ na jānāti na kālaṃ nāpi deśanām /
svayaṃ tāvanna jānāti kimidaṃ kathyate mayā /
te yānti paramaṃ sthānaṃ yatra mṛtyurna vidyate //
manaḥ pūrvamaṅgamā dharmā manaḥ śreṣṭhā manomayāḥ /
manasā suprasannena bhāṣate vā karoti vā //
yo na cittasya vaśagaścittaṃ tasyāntagaṃ sadā /
sa nirṇāśayati kleśān tamaḥ sūryodayo yathā //
cittaṃ śatruḥ paraṃ śatrurna śatruraparaḥ smṛtaḥ /
cittadagdhāḥ sadā sattvāḥ kāladagdhā yathā jaḍāḥ //
tena duḥkhe samo nāsti nirvāṇaṃ tasya dūrataḥ //
viṣayeṣu ratā nityaṃ na sa dharmaḥ kathañcana /
durdāntaṃ śīghragantṛ ca narakaṃ nayate dhruvam //
ye cittasya vaśaṃ yātā yātāste narakaṃ purā /
yaistu tad vāryate śīghraṃ na te duḥkhānugāminaḥ //
cittāyattaṃ bhavet karma karmāyattaṃ mano bhavet /
duṣṭena cetasā karma yaḥ karoti pumāniha /
pacyate narake tena jālinyā sa viḍambitaḥ //
na gacchet cittavaśatāṃ gacched dharmavaśe sadā /
dharmacārī sukhī nityaṃ pāpacārī na śarmabhāk //
cittāyattā kriyā sarvā cittāyattaṃ phalaṃ smṛtam /
vicittaṃ hi phalaṃ cittaṃ tathā phalamadhismṛtam //
na hi tad vidyate sthānaṃ yanna cittavaśānugam //
nirvāṇaṃ nāpi gacchanti jātyandhā iva satpatham //
pañcendriyāṇi jitavān pāpaṃ bhuṅkte na karhicit /
ekacittaṃ tathā karma kurute vividhe bhave //
pañcendriyavicitraṃ hi tathā karma bhave bhavet //
cittaṃ cittakaraṃ śūnyaṃ sarvathā naiva dṛśyate //
śobhanāśobhanaṃ karma tathā cittaṃ karoti hi //
divārātrau yathā cittaṃ sthitaṃ bhavati citragam /
preṣyante tatra cittena tridhā tu gaticāriṇaḥ //
cittasya damanaṃ sādhu cittaṃ dāntaṃ sukhāvaham //
yena cittaṃ sadā dāntaṃ tena doṣāḥ sadā jitāḥ /
yacca svakaṃ bhaved duḥkhaṃ yacca duḥkhaṃ paratra ca /
evaṃ vidhaṃ hi ye cittaṃ damayanti manīṣiṇaḥ /
hetupratyayajaṃ cittaṃ yogavāhi paraṃ ca tat /
ekaṃ karoti karmāṇi vividhāni calaṃ ca tat /
ekānekaṃ caraṃ sūkṣmaṃ kṣaṇādūrdhva na tiṣṭhati //
ko 'sau nayati lokāntamatha kena ca gacchati //
dṛśyāni tasya karmāṇi sañcayo na ca dṛśyate //
damanaṃ duṣkaraṃ tasya yasya bhūtirna vidyate /
na gatirjñāyate tasya gamanaṃ naiva dṛśyate /
nīyate ca kṣataṃ sarva jātyuttarasamāni ca //
śastreṇa chidyate nedaṃ jvalanena ca dahayate /
dṛḍhaṃ yat karmarajjvādi naraṃ badhnāti duḥkhitam /
muhūrtena śubhaṃ bhūtaṃ muhūrtenāśubhaṃ ca tat /
cittaṃ nayati lokāntaṃ vyasanaṃ na ca budhyate //
viprasannaṃ yathā toyaṃ viprasannaṃ yathā nabhaḥ /
gṛhastho 'pi sa me jñeyo muktaḥ saṃsārabandhanāt //
sandhārayati yo dhṛtyā sa dhīraḥ pāragāmikaḥ //
sandhārayati yo dhīmān sa loke paṇḍito naraḥ //
yo yathā kurute cittaṃ tathā kāmān sa paśyati /
kriyāṃ hi tatra kurute yatra (cittaṃ) pradhāvati /
bhrāmyate tribhavaḥ sarvaḥ na ca tattvaṃ sa paśyati //
nākāro vidyate tasya sañcayo 'pi na vidyate /
tadevaṃ viṣayaṃ matvā durnivārya ca sarvataḥ /
cittaṃ karoti karmāṇi yanna paśyanti bāliśāḥ //
bhavet pravartakaṃ duḥkhaṃ yena dhāvati bāliśaḥ //
vātādayo na doṣāḥ syurdoṣā rāgādayo matāḥ /
tasmād rāgasya vaśagaṃ na vidheyaṃ kadācana /
yaścittavaidyaḥ sa bhiṣag na śarīrabhiṣag bhṛśam /
manaścikitsako jñeyo na tathā laukiko mataḥ //
karmacintyaṃ samaṃ cintyaṃ na cittena prapadyate /
dhyānād dhyeyena kūṭena yaḥ pumān vanamāśritaḥ /
taṃ muktvā cittakaḥ so 'yaṃ saṃprahṛṣyati bāliśaḥ //
sucittamapi yaccitaṃ na taccittaṃ satāṃ matam /
yena sarvamidaṃ baddhaṃ jagad bhramati mohitam //
na cinotyaśubhaṃ karma yena dhāvati durgatim //
tasmāccittaṃ sadā rakṣyaṃ cañcalaṃ viṣamaṃ kharam /
paścāttu vyasane prāpte phalaṃ vindati karmaṇaḥ //
yaiścittaṃ nirjitaṃ dhīraiste loke sukhino matāḥ //
pāruṣyaṃ varjayet dhīmān samyagvāg bhīrato bhavet /
vāṅmanenābhibhūtā ye te yānti narakaṃ narāḥ //
yathā badhyati saṃsāre sugatiṃ naiva paśyati //
tamasāṃ yonirekā sā yāṃ vācaṃ bhāṣate mṛṣā //
satyaṃ ca na vivarjeta tasya dharmo na vidyate /
svargasya ca paraṃ vartma satyamuktaṃ gatajvaraiḥ //
satyaṃ na hi divaṃ yāti mokṣasyāsatyavādinaḥ /
satyena bhūṣito dhīmān śobhate devavad yathā //
na mātā na pitā cātha mitrāṇi na ca bāndhavāḥ /
trāṇamevaṃ yathā śrutvā tasmāt satyaparo bhavet //
satyaṃ tyaktvā mṛṣāvādaṃ yo naraḥ pratipadyate /
ratnaṃ tyaktvā sa pāpātmā pāṣāṇaṃ pratipadyate //
yasyātmā na bhavet dviṣṭo yasya vā narakaṃ priyam /
satyaṃ tyaktvā mṛṣāvāde kasmād yānti kubuddhayaḥ //
satyavādī hi puruṣaḥ priyaḥ sarvasya dehinaḥ /
anṛtaṃ sarvaduḥkhāntaṃ kaḥ pumān na vivarjayet //
nānyadeśāgataṃ satyaṃ nānyasmāt prārthyate hi tat /
dīpānāṃ ca paro dīpaḥ satyaṃ buddhena deśitam /
nātmano hi hitaṃ pathyaṃ (para)sya na kathañcana /
paścāttu paraduḥkhāya tat kathaṃ sevyate nṛbhiḥ //
satyavadhyā sadā kleśā vajravadhyā yathā nagāḥ /
na teṣāṃ vidyate saukhyamādityena yathā tamaḥ /
na dharme nārthanikaro na dharmā na ca bāndhavāḥ //
avyāpādaḥ paraṃ śreyo na vyāpādaḥ kathañcana //
avyāpādaparā ye tu te yānti padamacyutam /
sa cauraḥ sarvalokasya na cauraḥ prākṛtaḥ smṛtaḥ /
dharmavādī naro yastu carate dharmameva yaḥ //
sa yāti śāśvataṃ sthānaṃ yatra gatvā na śocyate /
lokottaraiḥ kalpaśataiḥ kadācit kathyate na vā /
tasmāt lokottaraṃ vākyaṃ laukikaṃ na kathañcana //
hitaṃ tattvaṃ ca yo mūḍho na gṛhṇāti gurorvacaḥ //
sa paścād vyasane prāpte tapyate svena cetasā /
priyo bhavati lokasya paścād deveṣu modati /
na tasya mātā na pitā buddho nāpi samvaraḥ /
mucyate devatābhiśca yo vācaṃ bhāṣate mṛṣā //
ye yathāvādino marttyā na ca tatkāriṇaḥ sadā //
tasmāt satyaparo nityaṃ nityaṃ dharmagatiḥ smṛtiḥ //
bhujyate sukṛtaṃ sarva karmabaddhā hi dehinaḥ //
ekākī karmaṇastasya phalaṃ bhuṅkte bhave bhave //

body.p: pūrvoktānāṃ trividhānāṃ svasya kṛta eva vipāko bhavati

lg.l: jalāpekṣī jano yastu kurute karma duṣkṛtam /
na jano janaśatānāṃ bhuṅkte hi vyañjanaṃ (kvacit) //
na hyanyena kṛtaṃ karma saṅkrāmatyaparasya tat /
duḥkhād duḥkhataraṃ yānti yebhyaḥ dharmo na rocate //
manuṣyāḥ pretaviṣaye narakaṃ vā prayānti hi //
anyonyaprabhavaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ duḥkhaṃ vā yadi vā sukham /
nādharmasya phalaṃ sādhu viparītaṃ na pacyate /
hetoḥ sadṛśatā dṛṣṭā jalasya vividhasya vai //
sādṛśyasya hetuphalaṃ viparītaṃ na jātu hi /
nāhetukaṃ phalaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ narake tu viśeṣataḥ /
deśānāṃ prati kālaṃ tu yat karma (vi)nivartate /
dīpādhīnā prabhā yadvat karmādhīnaṃ phalaṃ tathā /
sādṛśyaṃ karmaṇā dṛṣṭaṃ viparītaṃ na kalpyate //
tasmāt sucaritaṃ karma loke martya paratra ca //
dṛṣṭaṃ karmaphalaṃ loke dṛṣṭā eva vicitratā /
prayānti nirvṛttiṃ dhanyā yatra jñānyeva vidyate //
sadṛśaṃ hi phalaṃ hetoḥ kathayanti manīṣiṇaḥ /
tāṃ viśliṣya susambaddhāṃ gāḍhāṃ durviṣehāṃ parām /
gacchanti paramāṃ śānti yatra duḥkhaṃ na vidyate //
ye na dharmaparā nityaṃ ye na satyaparāḥ sadā /
ye ca yoniratā nityaṃ teṣāṃ duḥkhaṃ na hīyate //
dharmo vai deśito buddhairiha loke paratra ca //
tridṛṣṭivarjakā ye tu teṣāṃ duḥkhaṃ na vidyate //
na te vatsyanti saṃsāre vītadoṣā gatajvarāḥ //
maitrībhāvaviviktā ye te yānti paramāṃ gatim //
bhāvābhilāṣād viratā muktā niḥsaṃśayaṃ hi te //
naraḥ prapātāt patati sa paścāt pratibudhyate //
adarśanaṃ paraṃ śreyo na kudṛṣṭiḥ kathañcana /
loke prakṛtiduḥkhe 'smin hetubhūtā hi te janāḥ //
kleśanāgād vimokṣo yo yasya jñānapuraḥ saraḥ /
na yāti paramāṃ śāntiṃ yatra mithyā na kathyate //
lobhaḥ kūrā matiścaiva hetavo narakasya te //
na sukhāya bhavantyete asmiṃlloke na cāpare //
yadyasau bhramati prāyo lokesmin kinna cāpare /
yadyasambhrāmite loke ye ca duḥkhe nimajjati //
jñānāgninā hi dahayante kleśakāṣṭhā na śeṣataḥ //
kleśaiḥ kimartha saṃruddhā jālinī viṣa(yai) ratā /
mūḍhā ye bhūtamanaso narāḥ kāmasya sevinaḥ /
sadā ca pañcabhiḥ sthānairmuktisteṣāṃ na vidyate //
yatra yāti paraṃ vedaṃ manomohamayaṃ phalam /
trayo vā nirjitā doṣā yairidaṃ dahyate jagat //
yo na jānāti mūḍhātmā paścāt sa paritapyate //
tasmāt pāpaṃ na seveta yadīcchet sukhamātmanaḥ //
alpena vahninā śaile dahayante sarvato drumāḥ //
pāpena naiti nirvāṇaṃ nāsti pāpasamo ripuḥ //
pāpācāro hi puruṣo na kvacit sukhamedhate /
tasmāt pāpaṃ na kurvīta kaṣṭā pāpasya vedanā /
pāpaṃ pāpavipākaṃ ca pāpināṃ pacyate dhruvam //
na hi pāpaṃ na pāpasya tasmāt pāpaṃ vivarjayet /
svakṛtaṃ bādhate pāpaṃ parīkṣyaṃ naiva bhujyate /
kalyāṇasya phalaṃ sādhu kaṣṭaṃ pāpasya pacyate //
kṛtvā tu puruṣaḥ pāpaṃ kalyāṇaṃ nānusevate /
na śastrāgniprapātebhyo duḥkhaṃ syāt tādṛśaṃ nṛṇām //
na hi tīvrasya pāpasya sukhaṃ phalamavāpyate //
sukhasya vā phala tīvraṃ viparītaṃ na pacyate /
karmaṇāṃ sukṛtānāṃ ca tathā duḥkhaphalaṃ smṛtam /
pāpaṃ pāpānugaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ śubhasya ca śubhaṃ tathā //
tasmāt pāpaṃ sadā varjyamālambyañca śubhaṃ sadā //
pāpaṃ pāpavipākaṃ ca tasmād dhīmān vivarjayet //
asti pāpaṃ dhruvaṃ pāpe pāpamasti na pātakam /
acetanā dhruvaṃ bālā yeṣāṃ duścaritaṃ priyam /
mānuṣyaṃ durlabhaṃ prāpya yasya pāpaṃ priyaṃ bahu //
pāpād virajyate yastu śubhe vātīva rajyate /
sa sukhāt sukhamāpnoti nivṛttiṃ vā prayāti hi //
kāyasya bhedāt satataṃ devaloke sa jāyate //
nimittaṃ sadṛśaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ phalaṃ pāpasya karmaṇaḥ /
amedhyasya yathā gandhaḥ pratikūlo hi dehinām /
vileṣu vāsanaṃ yadvat puṣpe naṣṭe pradṛśyate /
anantā rajanī teṣāṃ (yeṣāṃ) pāpe sthitaṃ manaḥ //
prabhātaṃ rajanī teṣāṃ yeṣāṃ pāpe sthirā matiḥ /
ye na pāpātmano bhūtāste nityaṃ koṭacāriṇaḥ /
alpabhārā yathā nāvā plavate na nimajjati //
nāsau limpati pāpena paṅkena gaganaṃ yathā /
aśrutaṃ puruṣaḥ śṛṇvan śrutañcāpi bhaved dṛḍham //
pāpaṃ ca varjayed dhīmān pretya deveṣu jāyate /
guṇeṣu guṇasañcāro doṣeṣu ca tathaiva ca //
kṛtaṃ pāpeṣvamanasaḥ pāpaiḥ rakṣanti ye janāḥ //
viyogo 'yaṃ parīghāto na ca duḥkhairna vidyate /
(tāni) duḥkhāni bhuṅktāni na ca kliśyanti bāliśāḥ /
na sukhaṃ vidyate loke sarvaduḥkhaiḥ pariplutam //
duḥkhena khidyate bālo duḥkhahetau ca vartate //
hetau śataphalaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ bījaṃ prati yathā phalaiḥ /
smaryate (hi) yadā duḥkhaṃ tadā vidhyati dehinam //
nārakaṃ tu sadā duḥkhaṃ smṛtaṃ bhavati dehibhiḥ //
tadeva viditaṃ matvā jagat sarva samanvitam //
cittavegaṃ manaḥ sarva jīvitaṃ veti vartate //
nīyate narakaṃ mūḍho yatra pāpaṃ vipacyate /
yasya pāpād bhayaṃ nāsti sa pāpaṃ kurute bahu //
satyaṃ dānaṃ tathā kṣāntiḥ sadā cāpāpamitratā /
yā gatiḥ pretya gacchantī tānapāyān (hi me) śṛṇu //
sañjīvaṃ kāmasūtraṃ ca sampātaṃ dvau ca rauravau /
te punastatra pacyante taptāmbhasi kṛtā iva /
te sarve narakaṃ yānti cittairhi parivañcitāḥ //
kiṃ krandasi svayaṃ kṛtvā kukarma puruṣādhama! //
ye narāḥ kukṛtaṃ kṛtvā pañcatvaṃ yāntyamedhasaḥ /
yeṣāṃ tu niṣphalaṃ janma bījamuptaṃ yathoṣare //
sevate yastvasau mūḍhaḥ sa yāti tamaso tamaḥ //
na dārā na sutā nārtha na mitrāṇi kathañcana /
kiṃ krandasi svayaṃ kṛtvā kukṛtaṃ mūḍhacetanaḥ //
na tathāgnirna śastrāṇi na viṣaṃ nārayaḥ sthitāḥ /
digbhāge hi yathā gatvā saṃśrayante vanaspatīn /
yena yāti parāṃ śāntiṃ yena yātyasurālayam /
tatra hetuḥ paraṃ mohastamasāmapi yat tamaḥ //
nūnamātmā na te kānto babhūva narabhūmiṣu /
yena tvayā kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ putrārthena narādhamaḥ //
kiṃ kariṣyanti putrāste kiṃ dārāḥ kiṃ ca bāndhavāḥ /
vaśaṃ prāptāḥ svacittasya sarva eva viḍambitāḥ /
kiṃ krandasi vṛthā nāde vahninā paritāpitaḥ //
durmate tatra mā kranda kiṃ vṛthā paridevase //
kasmānna sevito dharmaḥ pāpañca nahi varjitam /
pāpād bahiśca puruṣo narakaṃ naiva paśyati //
yo na vindanti mūḍhātmā phalaṃ pāpasya karttṛkam /
so 'vaśyaṃ labhate doṣān kathaṃ bhokṣyasi durmate //
pāpena dahyate tasmādaśubhe na manaḥ kṛthāḥ //
tasmāt pāpaṃ na seveta yadi duḥkhaṃ na vāñchasi //
tad vaḥ pradhāvate gāḍhaṃ na ca ye tatra hetavaḥ //
śīlaṃ na rakṣitaṃ mūḍha pāpaṃ ca bahu sañcitam /
na vayaṃ kāraṇaṃ tatra yūyameva hi kāraṇam /
yaḥ pāpaṃ kurute karma sa hetustasya karmaṇaḥ //
tad vo prapadyate ghoraṃ kimasmān paribhāṣata //
nākṛtaṃ pacyate pāpaṃ na pāpaṃ syādahetukam /
yena yaddhi kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ tasya tat paripacyate //
patitā narake tīvre kiṃ vṛthā paritapyatha //
kiṃ krandatha vṛthā mūḍhā vañcitāḥ svena karmaṇā /
vipralabdho 'si bho martya! gacchannasi mahat tamaḥ //
nānyaḥ śatruryathā karma duṣkṛtaṃ tava pāpakam /
yasya śāntaṃ sadā cittaṃ viṣayairyo na hanyate /
narakasya dhvaniṃ śrutvā kathaṃ krandasi durmate! /
na dagdhā vahninā ye ca dagdhāste kukṛtaiḥ svakaiḥ /
kukṛtāgnimayaṃ pāpaṃ yad dhakṣyati hi tattvataḥ //
kukṛtāgnividagdhā ye te dagdhā narake narāḥ /
pāpāgnivarjitā ye tu na teṣāṃ narakodayaḥ /
yadyātmanaḥ priyo nityaṃ vibheṣi narakād yadi //
vivarjaya svapāpāni tato duḥkhaṃ na yāsyasi /
hetuḥ kṛto yathā pūrva tathā phalamavāpsyasi /
tasmāt saṃmukṣya mā rodi kiṃ vṛthā paridevase /
sa kṛtvā pāpakaṃ karma niyatā pāpavedanā //
aniṣṭaṃ pāpakaṃ karma kṛtvā rogavaśe sthitāḥ //
paridevati yo mūḍho vṛthā sa paridevati /
mayā kṛtāni karmāṇi phaladāni mamaiva hi //
sukhāvāptiṃ na paśyāmi kṣemaṃ vā narakasya me /
na vārthā nāpi mitrāṇi na putrā na ca yoṣitaḥ /
trāyante vyasanādasmāt kṛtaghnā bata te mama //
saṃkruddhā iva te, krūrā bhaviṣyanti samantataḥ /
yacca yaccehaṃ paśyāmi jaṅgamaṃ sthāvaraṃ tathā /
tat sarva vyākulaṃ caiva vahninā paridīpitam //
ghore tamasi majjāsi sāgare ca hṛtaplavaḥ //
samīkṣya karmajaṃ nityaṃ dhyeyo hetuḥ punaḥ punaḥ /
yat pūrva karaṇīyaṃ te tatpaścāt paricintyase /
tasmānna carito dharmaḥ paiśunyaṃ ca na varjitam /
na tathā sa prabhavati yathā vahnistadudbhavaḥ //
pareṣāṃ sampadaṃ dṛṣṭvā mama syāditi cintitam /
dahanād dahanaṃ prāpto tapyase ca vikatthyase //
yat tvayā kathitaṃ pūrva tat tvāṃ dahati nānalaḥ //
ki tapyase rodiṣi ca karma kṛtvā sudāruṇam //
āryāpavādakā ye ca ye ca karmaphaladviṣaḥ /
te mṛtvā narakaṃ yānti ye ca mithyāvinītakāḥ //
ye cānye sukhasaṃsaktā nityaṃ pāparatā narāḥ /
duḥkhād duḥkhaṃ tu te yānti cittena parivañcitāḥ //
(hitaḥ sadaivaṃ narakasya rodhī) / sevyo 'pavargo daśadharma eṣaḥ //
adīpikā prabhā nāsti adānasya kutaḥ sukham //
dānena virahāt tadvat sukhaṃ pretairna labhyate //
yaṃ pretya pretalokasya triloke ca yathādhamāḥ /
na dātrā labhyate kiñcit kṛtanāśo na vidyate /
na trātā sarvato 'smākaṃ hanta kṛcchragatā vayam /
yaḥ karoti śubhaṃ nityamaśubhaṃ na ca sarvadā //
yeṣāmarthe kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ kleśayan mānasaṃ bahu //
anena te gatāḥ sarve bhavānāṃ trāsane sthitaḥ /
svakṛtaṃ bhujyate bāla! pareṣāṃ naiva bhujyate /
na kṣaṇo nāpi hi lavo na muhūrto na śarvarī //
notsave dṛśyate toyaṃ taḍāgeṣu ca śuṣyati //
mudgarāśimayā(dārāḥ) na putrāḥ na ca bāndhavāḥ /
na dārāḥ nāpi mitrāṇi na putrāḥ nāpi bāndhavāḥ //
nānyastrātā yathā karma trividhaṃ bhujyate mayā //
dānaṃ śīlaṃ śrutaṃ cāpi trividhaṃ parikīrtitam /
na bhūyaḥ pāpakaṃ karma kariṣyāmi kathañcana /
gamyāgamyaṃ na vindanti bhakṣyābhakṣyaṃ tathaiva ca /
na kuryāda duṣkṛtaṃ karma mātsaryopahataḥ param /
teṣāṃ hi saphalaṃ janma teṣāṃ buddhiravañcitā /
te ca pūjyāḥ sadā sadbhiryeṣāṃ dharme sadā matiḥ //
śeṣo dahati lokān vai kalpānala iva drumān //
nānalasya hi tadvīrya kṣudhāyā yādṛśaṃ balam /
dīrghāgamasya yad duḥkhaṃ na tad varṇayituṃ kṣamam //
garbhasthasya hi yad duḥkha na tad varṇayituṃ kṣamam //
yad duḥkhaṃ paragṛddhasya na ca varṇayituṃ kṣamam //
yad bhavatyadhikaṃ duḥkhaṃ na tad varṇayituṃ kṣamam //
praṇaṣṭe hṛdi yad duḥkhaṃ na tad varṇayituṃ kṣamam //
āmṛtyu yad bhave duḥkhaṃ na tad varṇayituṃ kṣamam //
apāyajanakaṃ yasya na tad varṇayituṃ kṣamam //
vyasanaṃ putradārāṇāṃ yad dṛṣṭ(vā) hṛdi jāyate /
narakāṇāṃ mahāmārgo na tad varṇayituṃ kṣamam //
yad duḥkhaṃ naṣṭamanaso na tad varṇayituṃ kṣamam //
yad bhavecchokajaṃ duḥkhaṃ na tad varṇayituṃ kṣamam //
yad duḥkhaṃ jīrṇakāyasya na tad varṇayituṃ kṣamam //
yad duḥkhaṃ jāyate vṛttau na tad varṇayituṃ kṣamam //
yat kurvantyaśubhaṃ bālā yacca gacchati durgatim /
yena tena ca samprītiḥ yatra tatra ca bhojanam /
yasya tasya ca santuṣṭo yasya tasya prakupyati /
yatra tatra ca saṃsakto sa mūḍha iti kathyate //
tena doṣeṇa mahatā narā duḥkhasya bhāginaḥ //
tena viddho hi puruṣaḥ svadhistutyaḥ samantataḥ //
sa jīvamāno 'pi mṛto mṛtastu narakāya saḥ //
śītoṣṇaṃ ca sahantyete kṣutpipāse tathaiva ca /
gātrāntā ca kriyā kāryā yātrā dharmāya sarvadā //
na kausīdye matiṃ kuryāt kuśīle śīlakāmukaḥ /
saṃsāre sīdati nityaṃ na ca duḥkhāt pramucyate //
evaṃvidhā duḥkhaparamparā hi, sattvaḥ kukarmeṣu (matiṃ) na kuryāt /
loke tridoṣānalasampradīpte, kuryāt parāṃ śāntikṛpā mṛte na //

body.p:
cittañca vāk tathā karma saṃyojanantu pāpakam /
narakapretatiryakkṣutkausīdyāni vidurdaśa //

(karuṇādānaśīlāni kṣāntirvīryamathāpi ca /
dhyānaṃ prajñātha nirvāṇo mano bhikṣuśca te daśa // )

lg.l: pūjanīyaḥ satāṃ yāti pretya svarge ca modate //
kṛpānvitaḥ sa puruṣo candramā iva śobhate //
tasya mitramayā lokā bhavanti yaśasā vṛtāḥ //
manuṣyaloke te devā ye kāruṇyena vibhūṣitāḥ /
kāruṇyena daridrā ye te daridrāḥ satāṃ matāḥ //
mṛdvāśayā hi ye martyāḥ sādhuvat kāñcanopamāḥ /
te ca sattvāḥ sadodyuktā nityaṃ dharmaparāyaṇāḥ /
na rātrau na divā teṣāṃ dharmo hi vinivartate /
bhuktvā saukhyaṃ nirupamaṃ paścād gacchati nirvṛtim //
kāruṇyaṃ munibhiḥ śastaṃ kāruṇyaṃ nirmalaṃ saraḥ /
sa jano hi tu kalpānte duḥkhādāśu vimucyate //
śreyāṃsi tasya rohanti kedāra iva śālayaḥ //
na saṅkalpe mano yeṣāṃ ramate doṣavarjitam /
priyo bhavati loke 'smin paścād deveṣu modate //
sukhasya ca paraṃ mūlaṃ kṛpaiva parikīrtitā /
(hṛdi) yasya kṛpā nāsti sa duḥkhī parikīrtyate //
ekavidyā paraṃ mātā maitrī caikā sukhāvahā //
ahiṃsakāḥ sadā dhanyāḥ saddṛṣṭiḥ paramā śubhā /
etad ṛju sadā satyaṃ pāpānāṃ cāpi varjanam //
dānaṃ bhavati śuddhaṃ tad viparītaṃ sakalmaṣam //
dānaṃ śīlaṃ tathā jñānamete nityaṃ sukhāvahāḥ //
na dānajñāna śīleṣu yeṣāṃ sammiśritā matiḥ /
te nityaduḥkhitāḥ sattvāḥ sukhaṃ teṣāṃ na vidyate //
bhavanti vibudhāḥ hitvā tasmād dānaparo bhavet //
mātsarya vai phalaṃ sarva taduktaṃ tattvabuddhibhiḥ //
yo dadāti sukhaṃ tasya nīyate jāyate sukham /
sukhaṃ bhavati dānāddhi tasmād dānaṃ praśasyate //
ye prayacchanti dānāni te taranti bhavārṇavam //
dānamādau sadā deyaṃ śīlaṃ labhyaṃ prayatnataḥ /
tṛṣṇā jñānena hantavyā mārga eṣa sukhāvahaḥ //
na śakyaṃ tadvinā śreyaḥ prāptuṃ padamanuttamam //
adāne na manaḥ kārya nityaṃ dānarato bhavet /
taṃ viditvā mahāvīro nityaṃ dānarato bhavet /
adā(nā)dapi deveṣu devā hi na sukhā matāḥ //

body.p: dānī yatra kutrāpi vasan sukhī bhavati

lg.l: svayaṃ kṛtasya dānasya phalaṃ bhavati tādṛśam //
sarvadā na tapastābhyāṃ phalaṃ bhavati śītalam //
pūrva pramādacārī yo na dānādiṣu vartate /
paścād bhavati sa śrīmān dānasya phalamīdṛśam //
yad bhujyate sadā cittaṃ gurubhyaścāpi dīyate /
yad vanaṃ śobhanaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ viparītaṃ yathā tṛṇam //
manuṣyabhūmau dānāni dattvā yānti śubhāṃ gatim /
karmāyattaṃ phalaṃ sarva na phalaṃ syādahetukam //
sa jīvati hi loke 'smin yo dharmamanuvartate /
dharmamūḍhaḥ sadā mūḍho jīvannapi mṛtaiḥ samaḥ //
nāsau martya iti jñeyaḥ preto vigrahavānayam //
guṇavāṃstu naro vandyaḥ nirguṇaḥ paśubhiḥ samaḥ /
guṇāguṇavidhijño yaḥ sa deva iti kathyate //
sujīvitaṃ bhavettasya yasya tyāge sthitaṃ manaḥ /
mātṛvat pitṛvad dṛṣṭaṃ dānaṃ nityaṃ sukhāvaham //
tasmād duścaritaṃ hitvā nityaṃ sucarito bhavet //
na mātā na pitā nārthā dayitā nāpi bāndhavāḥ /
na sukhā (ste) tathā dṛṣṭā yathā śīlaṃ surakṣitam //
te yānti devasadanaṃ racitāḥ svena karmaṇā //
śīlaṃ rakṣatu medhāvī yathā yānaṃ sukhatrayam /
praśaṃsāvṛttalābhaṃ ca pretya svarge ca modate //
śīlavān yo hi puruṣaḥ śīlamevāti sevate /
sasukho nirvṛttiṃ yāti yatra mṛtyurna vidyate //
tasmācchīlaṃ sadā sevyaṃ dauḥśīlyaṃ ca vigarhitam //
ravivad bhrājate śīlaṃ dauḥśīlyaṃ caiva garhitam /
āyuryāti dhruvaṃ dhīmān nityaṃ śīlenaṃ vṛṃhitam //
śīlavastreṇa ye channāste channāḥ puruṣā matāḥ /
śīlena varjitā ye tu nagnāste paśubhiḥ samāḥ //
yo na prārthayate kāmān śīlavān puruṣaḥ sadā /
tasmāt prahāya traiguṇyaṃ śīlameva sadā caret //
devebhyo rocate taddhi trāṇaṃ śīlaṃ śubhānvitam /
devebhyo rocate taddhi trāṇaṃ śīlaṃ śubhānvitam /
śīlavān yadi jānīyāt phalaṃ śīlasya yādṛśam //
ādau śastaṃ tathā madhye nidhane śastameva tat //
śīlacaryā paraṃ saukhyaṃ dhanacaryā na tādṛśī //
narā dhanena hīyante śīlena na kathañcana /
śīlavarjī hi puruṣo na kvacit sukhamedhate //
snātvā gacchanti puruṣā devaloke ca nirvṛte /
śubhena śobhate martyaḥ pūjyate rājabhiḥ sadā /
śīlaṃ sucaritaṃ kārya duṣkṛtaṃ ca vivarjayet //
samyak karma susaṃlagnā devalokeṣu te budhāḥ //
ahanyahani teṣāṃ hi sukhaṃ bhavati naikaśaḥ //
svarge ramanti ye devāstat sarva śubhajaṃ phalam //
svagṛhaṃ hi yathā martyāḥ praviśanti gatavyathāḥ /
etān guṇān sadā matvā priyatvamapi cātmanaḥ /
śīlaṃ surakṣitaṃ kārya dauḥśīlyaṃ ca vivarjayet //
phalaṃ śīlasya tu sukhaṃ devalokeṣu pacyate /
narāḥ prayānti sugatiṃ jñānena ca parāyaṇā //
na me durgatinā trāṇaṃ śīlaṃ hi trāṇamuttamam //
sa kutsitena śīlena kutsito jāyate naraḥ //

body.p: śīlavirahitaḥ mūḍho bhavati svargamapi na yāti

lg.l: tṛṣṇākṣayo na bhavati sa paścāt paritapyate //
tacchīlasya viśuddhasya prāpyate hi phalaṃ mahat //
phalaṃ hi trividhaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ hīnamadhyottamaṃ tathā //
nityaṃ tat sukhadaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ dharmateyaṃ vyavasthitā //
śīlodbhavā yā vimalā prabhā bhavati dehinām /
śīlaṃ saptavidhaṃ ramyaṃ yo rakṣati narottamaḥ /
sa kāmaṃ bhuñjati phalaṃ sugatena ca deśitam //
martyalokād divaṃ yānti na kaṣṭaṃ tapacāriṇaḥ //
śrutimātraṃ ca (tacchīlaṃ) ramyād ramyataraṃ ca tat /
labhate puruṣaḥ kartā phalaṃ śīlasya śobhanam //
devatā vā manuṣyo vā labhate paramaṃ padam //
antarbahiśca ye sārāste narā vastuto dṛḍhāḥ /
na ketakī campakapuṣpagandhā, tamālake nāgarucaśca gandhaḥ /
prayānti gandhā hiṃ yathā sureṇa, anuttaraḥ śīlavatāṃ sugandhaḥ //
evaṃ surakṣitaṃ śīlaṃ narān nayati saṅgatim /
na hi śīlādṛte kaścit padaṃ sukhamavāpnute //
dhanaṃ vinā samāyāti kṣāntiṃ naiva kathañcana //
yaśasā pūjyate nityamiha loke paratra ca //
yeṣāṃ kṣāntimayaṃ dravyaṃ te loke dhaninaḥ smṛtāḥ //
kṣāntyā yathā smṛtāḥ sadbhistaranti khula mānavāḥ //
sukhāvahā sadā nṛṇāṃ duḥkhasya ca vighātikā /
sā guṇaudhaiḥ sadā pūrṇā śivā bhavati dehinām /
sā praśaste sukhe prāpte kṣāntiḥ kāryā prayatnataḥ /
tāni tāni prasiddhāni vipulāni bhavanti ca //
ye 'rthā lokottare siddhā ye ca lokeṣu sammatāḥ /
te vīryeṇa prasādhyante vīryahīnā na jātu vai //
tasmād devān guṇān matvā vīryavān niyatendriyaḥ /
yasyaikāgrakaraṃ cittaṃ tasya doṣā na bādhakāḥ /
yasya cittaṃ dhruvaṃ śāntaṃ nirvāṇābhirataṃ sadā /
ekārāmasya yatino yat sukhaṃ jāyate hṛdi /
yat saukhyamativijñeyaṃ na saukhyaṃ laukikaṃ matam //
akṣayaṃ cāvyayaṃ caiva padaṃ hi sthitamagrataḥ //
yat sukhaṃ dhyānajaṃ bhāti kutastasyopamā parā //
sā hi santrāyate sarvān puruṣān gatipañcakāt /
na mātā na pitā tatra gacchantamanugacchati //
caturṇā caiva satyānāmagre dve tu prakīrtite /
yatra janma na mṛtyurna vidyate duḥkhasambhavaḥ //
satyāni catvāri śivāni tāni, subhāvitānyeva samīkṣya vidvān /
acintako yastu vibhūtabuddhiḥ kāmeṣu sakto bhavabhogabaddhaḥ /
sa bandhanaiḥ kāmamayairnibaddho, na mucyate jātijarābhayebhyaḥ //
vicintya yo duḥkhamidaṃ viśālaṃ, na khedamāyāti bhavārṇavebhyaḥ /
sa kāmavāṇairnihato hi mūḍhaḥ, kaṣṭāmavasthāṃ narake 'pi yāti //
ābhyantaraṃ kṣemasukhaṃ ca hitvā, kiṃ kāmabhogābhiratā hi bālāḥ /
naite bijānanti bhayaṃ ca tīvramabhyeti mṛtyurjvalanaprakāśaḥ //
viṣayeṣu hi saṃghuṣṭaṃ jagad bhramati cakravat //
sa mārgo deśakaḥ śreṣṭho yo mārgo bhāṣitaḥ śivaḥ /
sujīvitaṃ bhavet tasya yasya buddhau sthitaṃ manaḥ /
sujīvitaṃ bhavet tasya yasya dharme sthitaṃ manaḥ /
sujīvitaṃ bhavet tasya yasya saṅghe sthitaṃ manaḥ /
sujīvitaṃ bhavet tasya yasya satye sthitaṃ manaḥ /
sujīvitaṃ bhavet tasya yasya mārge sthitaṃ manaḥ /
sa doṣādeva nirmukto na devaḥ krīḍati svayam //
sā sukhodbhāvikā krīḍā na krīḍā rāgakārikā //
tadā kṣemaṃ śivaṃ sthānaṃ prāpnoti puruṣottamaḥ //
yo hinasti na bhūtāni mitravettā sadākṣayaḥ /
vibheti yo na viṣayaiḥ vijñeyastādṛśo yatiḥ //
vāhyate yo na viṣayaistṛṇanadyā na vāhayate /
nātītaṃ śocate yo hi buddhayā (caiva) gataspṛhaḥ /
nirvāṇe (ca) matiryasya dharme nityaṃ sthitā bhavet /
dāruvadviṣayā yasya tasya duḥkhaṃ na vidyate //
sa yātyuttamamadhvānaṃ yatra gatvā na śocati //
sa yāti paramāṃ śāntiṃ yatra gatvā na śocyate //
mokṣe 'sti yasya tu mano na saṃsāre kathañcana /
nāsau badhnāti saṃsāre muktaḥ pakṣī yathāmbare //
sa mukta iti vijñeyastattvavid ṛtavāṃśca saḥ //
dīptaṃ paśyati saṃsāraṃ yaḥ sa yogī satāṃ mataḥ //
karmāṇyārabhate yo na nirāśaḥ sa ca karmasu /
yo na hṛṣyati harṣeṣu bhayeṣu na bibheti ca /
ekāśī vṛkṣamūle yaḥ sadā dhyānaṃ samīhate /
kleśānāṃ mūlapākaṃ hi kausīdyaṃ yasya vidyate /
kausīdyameva yasyāsti tasya dharmo na vidyate /
sa bhikṣurdeśito buddhaiḥ na bhoktā svakagocare //
yo hi nārhati piṇḍāya nāsau piṇḍāya kalpate /
yasya piṇḍikṛtāḥ kleśāḥ sarpā iva vileśayāḥ //
saṃrabdhā gṛhibhiḥ sārdha yathā nāgā vanāśritāḥ //
ramate yasya tu mano bhikṣurbhavati tādṛśaḥ //
kāmavādī samo dakṣaḥ sa bhikṣuḥ śānta ucyate //
āruṣyeṣu ca tattvajñaḥ śāstrā bhikṣuḥ sa ucyate //
viṣavad yasya viṣayāḥ sa bhikṣurdeśito budhaiḥ //
sa dharmaḥ kathito jñeyo viparītastṛṇaiḥ samaḥ //
sarvakṛtyakaro jñeyo yaḥ saṅghāya ca tatparaḥ //
na parārtha na lobhārtha yaśo 'rtha kurute na tu /
na svargārtha matiryasya lābhārtha yaśase na vā /
nirvāṇārtha kriyā sarvā sa bhikṣuḥ srota ucyate //
vañcito dharmavinayād yāti tat svena karmaṇā /
asaṃvareṇa yo dagdhaḥ sa dagdho vahninā bhṛśam /
aśubhaṃ vardhate tasya divārātrau ca sarvataḥ /
na teṣāṃ sukaraṃ janma na teṣāṃ sukaraṃ manaḥ /
atyuccaśca śubho mārgaḥ sa 'dharma' iti kathyate /
saṃvarasya sadā dāsāsteṣāṃ duḥkhaṃ na vidyate /
evaṃ jñātvā naraḥ sarva saṃvaraṃ pratipadyate //
sadāyaṃ lāghavaṃ yāti nidhanaṃ cāśu gacchati /
śaśvat sa patito dṛṣṭaḥ śāsanāntāt pravartate /
saṅkīrṇā dinacaryā ca kurvan bhikṣuḥ praṇaśyati //
na hi rājasevako bhikṣuryaḥ sevyo devatairapi /
na karmaṇyavipāke ca mārgāmārge tathaiva ca //
kṣiṇoti retasaṃ svasya jīvitaṃ naiva gacchati //
na ca vindati yat kṛtvā sukhamanyatra bhujyate /
pāpāni yāti nityaṃ sa tena gacchati durgatim //
lobhamoheṣu ye śaktāste śaktā tṛṣṇayā sadā /
apakṣapātī dharmajño na sa gacchati durgatim //
dagdhe kleśe vayaṃ dagdhā vanaṃ dagdhaṃ yathāgninā /
na yāsyati puraṃ śāntaṃ yo ca mṛtyuṃ na vindati //

body.p:
karuṇādānaśīlānikṣāntirvīryamathāpi ca /
dhyānaṃ prajñātha nirvāṇo mano bhikṣuśca te daśa //

lg.l: ramaṇīyāni puṇyāni phalaṃ teṣāṃ paraṃ śubham /
tasmāt kuruta puṇyāni nāsti puṇyasamaṃ dhanam //
puṇyaṃ kṛtvā gatā devāḥ puṇyaṃ nayati sadgatim /
puṇyaṃ kṛtvā narā loke modante tridive hi (te) //
puṇyādhikā hi puruṣā bhavanti sukhinaḥ sadā /
tasmāt kuruta puṇyāni nāsti puṇyasamaṃ sukham //
puṇyaṃ kṛtvā gatā devāḥ puṇyapriyadhanasya ca /
hetubhūtaṃ sadā dṛṣṭaṃ tasmāt puṇyaṃ paraṃ sukham //
tasmāt sukhaṃ paraṃ puṇyaṃ nāsti puṇyādṛte sukham //
kutasteṣāṃ sukhaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ sikatāsu yathā ghṛtam //
na teṣāṃ vidyate śarma duḥkhaṃ teṣāmanuttaram //
mānuṣyaṃ sukṛtaṃ hyetat kṛte bhavati dehinaḥ /
priyo bhavati yasyātmā yasya saukhye sthitā matiḥ /
puṇyakārī sadā dānto padaṃ gacchati cāvyayam /
vicitraṃ hi kṛtaṃ puṇyaṃ vicitraṃ paripacyate /
yo (hi) dharma parityajya ramate kukṛte naraḥ /
yo hi deśayate dharma pareṣāṃ hitakāṅkṣayā /
sa mātā sa pitā caiva nirvāṇapuradeśakaḥ //
na mūlyaṃ vidyate śāstuḥ subhāṣitapadasya vai //
na padaṃ labhate śāntaṃ yad dhanairupalabhyate /
dravyaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ na dharmo buddhibandhanam //
dravyaṃ vinaśyati nṛṇāṃ dharmadravyaṃ na jātu vai /
dharma ekaḥ paraṃ trāṇaṃ dharma ekaḥ parā gatiḥ /
sa tadā duḥkhamāpnoti narakeṣu punaḥ punaḥ //
puṇyaprabhāvo vipulo yasya śīle rataṃ manaḥ //
bhavajanyaṃ phalaṃ yasya (yasmai) dharmo na rocate /
dharmo hi nayati svarga dharmacārī sukhānvitaḥ //
śreyo bhaveddhi maraṇaṃ na tu dharmavigarhaṇam /
dharmeṇa varjito lokaḥ saṃsāre sarvadā bhramet //
vṛthā saukhyamidaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭvā yāto yathāparaḥ //
prayānti tat padaṃ śāntaṃ yatra duḥkhaṃ na vidyate //
indriyāṇāṃ vaśe yastu viṣayeṣu tathaiva ca /
buddho yeṣāṃ bahumato nityaṃ dharmaśca gocaraḥ /
udyogānāṃ sadā dhyānaṃ yena gacchati nirvṛtim //
mātā pitṛsamaḥ pūjya upādhyāyaḥ sadā bhavet /
agrāhyā vā sadā dṛṣṭā muninā tattvadarśinā /
sukhasya bhūmayo hyetā niḥsukhā viṣayā matāḥ //
saukhyaṃ tasya bhavennityaṃ na saukhyaṃ devabhūmiṣu //
sa āhūya prayatnena sevitavyaḥ sadā naraiḥ //
anāgate bhayaṃ yo hi paśyati buddhacakṣuṣā /
sa hi vighne tu samprāpte na viṣādena bādhyate //
yāvat samagraṃ janmedaṃ jñānaṃ yāti vināvilam /
kṣayaṃ prayānti puṇyāni tvaritaṃ yāti jīvitam /
yo hi dharma parityajya pramādopahato naraḥ /
na sañcinoti puṇyāni sa paścādapi tapyate //
na yāvadāyāti jarā na vyādhiḥ saha mṛtyunā /
tāvat kāryāṇi puṇyāni mā paścāt paritapyatha //
kiṃ tasya jīvitenārthaḥ kiṃ bhāgyaiḥ kiṃ ca bāndhavaiḥ /
sabalendriyatāṃ prāpya yo na dharmarataḥ sadā //
viratiścāpi pāpebhyaḥ sādhūnāṃ darśane na ca //
śīlena yaḥ suro janma labdhvedaṃ kāmamohitaḥ /
na sañcinoti puṇyāni sa bhavaṃ nātivartate //
devāste hi sadā vandyā ye dharme niratāḥ sadā /
ye tu nityaṃ bhavāsaktāste sarve nidhanaṃ gatāḥ //
saṅgṛhītaṃ sadā śīlaṃ jñānaṃ ca parivartitam /
tasmād doṣān parityajya guṇāḥ sevyāḥ prayatnataḥ //
prāpya janmāntara cāpi nirvṛtiṃ cāśu gacchati //
panthāno muninā śāstre uktā ye tattvadarśinā /
satyaṃ hi dānaṃ ca tathaiva maitrī sattveṣu rakṣā priyavāditā ca /
yasya śuddhaṃ sadā cittaṃ nirmalaṃ maṇivat sadā /
sa śānto nirmamo dhīmān devānāmantikaṃ vrajet //
tṛṇavat kāñcanaṃ yasya kāmā yasya viṣopamāḥ /
yasya buddhisthitaṃ veśma na buddhiḥ kvāpi rāgiṇī /
manuṣyāṇāṃ balād devā devānāṃ balino narāḥ /
dharmādhīnaṃ sukhaṃ sarva dharmādhīnā hi nirvṛtiḥ /
dharmaḥ supteṣu jāgarti dharmo hi paramā gatiḥ //
jñānena varjito moho devaistu hyasurā jitāḥ //
sopānabhūtā ye tāni karmāṇi tridivasya hi /
yoniṃ tyaktvā narā yānti devalokaṃ sukhodayam //
prabhayā te ca divyantaḥ svaśarīreṇa jātayā /
yad devā devabhavane śīlaṃ tatra hi kāraṇam //
yadīpsitaṃ sambhavati sambhūtaṃ ca na hīyate /
vartate ca śubhaṃ nityaṃ tat sarva śubhahetukam //
dānamaitryā sadā yukto devānāṃ samatāṃ vrajet //
adatte na ratiḥ kiñcid dāne cāsya sadāmatiḥ /
vimanaskaṃ hi yat prīte puruṣe kurute laghu /
sukha (prāṇo) hi yo devaḥ pramādaṃ nānusevate /
atīva saukhyaṃ labhate kasmād deveṣu sarvadā //
nyūnamadhyaṃ tu yasyaitat phalaṃ puṇyasya dṛśyate //
yena yāvaddhi yat puṇyaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavati dehinā /
tasya tāvaddhi tat saukhyaṃ devalokeṣu pacyate //
svāgataṃ tava bho bhadra! sukṛtaṃ kṛtavānasi /
vanādriṣu ca naikeṣu ramasva saha daivataiḥ //
vimāneṣu ca ramyeṣu ramasva saha daivataiḥ //
nṛtyamānaḥ sukhī nityaṃ ramasva saha daivataiḥ //
na saukhyād viramantyete manaḥ saukhyena mohitāḥ //
trividhaṃ sukṛtaṃ kṛtvā bhāvayitvā ca saptadhā /
trisaṃkhyākān ripūn hatvā yānti deveṣu mānavāḥ //
samaṃ ca trividhaṃ dattvā devānāmantikaṃ gataḥ //
adattaṃ ca dhanaṃ dattvā dattvānandaṃ ca sarvataḥ /
kathyate sa mṛṣāvādastaṃ hitvā sugatiṃ vrajet //
paiśūnyaṃ ca sadā hitvā maitryanarthakaraṃ padam /
adharmo yasya jihvāgre na bhūto na bhaviṣyati /
tatprāpya yo na dharmajñaḥ sa paścāt paritapyate //
yena yena yathā karma kṛtaṃ bhavati śobhanam /
tasya tasya tathā dṛṣṭaṃ phalaṃ tadanugāmikam //
yena yena yathā cīrṇaṃ tasya tasya tathā phalam //
na vā kurvanti karmāṇi te 'surā mūḍhacetasaḥ //
phalaṃ yeṣāṃ priyaṃ cittaṃ na ca śīle ratā matiḥ /
vinābījaṃ phalaṃ nāsti vinā dīpaṃ kutaḥ prabhā? /
vinā śīlaiḥ kutaḥ svargo muktirjñānaṃ vinā kutaḥ? //
yaṃ neṣṭakaṃ bhavatyeva tat sarvamamalaṃ smṛtam //
saṃsāre ye na rakṣanti svamano (nanu) dehinaḥ /
vṛkṣamūle śmaśāne vā tathā ca girikandare /
maitreṇa cetasā ye tu te janāḥ svargagāminaḥ //
dharmāṇāṃ dharmatāṃ ye ca paśyanti vividhā samāḥ /
na ca rakṣanti saṃsāre te janāḥ svargagāminaḥ //
paśyanti ca na rakṣanti te janāḥ svargagāminaḥ //
ye jānanti (sadā) cittāḥ te janāḥ svargagāminaḥ //
paśyanti ye bhayaṃ loke te janāḥ svargagāminaḥ //
saṃtuṣṭāḥ svena cittena te janāḥ svargagāminaḥ //
na rātrau na divā yeṣāṃ kausīdyadyutiriṣyate /
kaukṛtyaṃ styānamiddhaṃ ca kausīdyaṃ ca viśeṣataḥ /
saṃkṣipanti sadā duḥkhaṃ te janāḥ svargagāminaḥ //
ye paśyanti budhāḥ prajñāṃ te janāḥ svargagāminaḥ //
duḥkhaṃ duḥkhavipākaśca duḥkheṣu ca manaśca yat /
paśyanti ye sadā tattvaṃ te janāḥ svargagāminaḥ //
śuklāvadātaṃ ye vastraṃ pāṃsukūlaṃ tathaiva ca /
santuṣyanti na kupyanti te janāḥ svargagāminaḥ //
śuklāvadātaṃ ye vastraṃ pāṃsukūlaṃ tathaiva ca /
śayyātale yathā bhūmau harmyāgre vā tathāpare /
na duṣyanti (na hṛṣyanti) te janāḥ svargagāminaḥ //
tattvato ye prapaśyanti te janāḥ svargagāminaḥ //
apriyaṃ vā priyaṃ vāpi ye śrutvā tīvrasambhramāt /
saṃkṣipanti na rakṣanti te janāḥ svargagāminaḥ //
karmaṇāṃ ca vipākaṃ ca kṛtaṃ (ye dhīracetasā) /
kurvanti vidhivat sarva te janāḥ svargagāminaḥ //
dhū(ma) miśraṃ yathā kāṣṭhaṃ vi(ṣṭhā) miśraṃ yathodanam /
yeṣāṃ tṛṣṇānugā cāśā sarvathā naiva cetasi //
sa dhīraḥ pāragaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ sukhī nirvāṇamāśritaḥ //
yatra rāgādinirmuktaṃ tat sukhaṃ nirmalaṃ matam //
sa sukhāt sukhatāṃ yāti yatra tṛṣṇā na bādhate //
mṛtyupāśairna baddhasya na sukhaṃ vidyate kvacit /
yat sukhaṃ kāmajanakaṃ na tat saukhyaṃ satāṃ matam //
kvacicchāntaṃ vanaṃ ramyaṃ kvacid devāḥ pramādinaḥ //
viparītaṃ na sadṛśaṃ bhānoḥ śītā yathā prabhā /
tat sukhaṃ tat paraṃ saukhyaṃ nedaṃ tṛṣṇāvidāṃ matam /
tat sukhaṃ paramaṃ śāntaṃ vītatṛṣṇai niṣevyate /
niḥsevitaṃ vanamidaṃ ye gatāḥ paramaṃ padam //
nārhanti sevituṃ ramyaṃ vanaṃ śāntaṃ subhāṣitam /
na rāgavyākulaṃ cittaṃ vaneṣu labhate dhṛtim //
sa ratiṃ labhate śāntiṃ vane puruṣasattamaḥ //
sa śāntiṃ naiva labhate vane śānte sukhāvahe //
yeṣāṃ tu manasā nityaṃ vane dhyānaniyoginām /
vanaṃ teṣāṃ sadāramyaṃ na tu rāgagaveṣiṇām //
vaneṣu bhāvitaṃ cittaṃ nagareṣu na kupyate /
tasmād vanaṃ sadā sevyaṃ nagaraṃ naiva śasyate //
tasmād vanaṃ paraṃ śāntaṃ yogināmālayaṃ mahat /
na yāmeṣvapi sā dṛṣṭā nityaṃ rāgānurāgiṇī //
yā tu kleśavaśāt prītiḥ (sā prītiḥ) śāśvatā nahi //
yasmāt tat pratibaddhaṃ hi śreyasāṃ padamucyate //
sudṛṣṭaṃ labhate sthānaṃ yatra doṣo na vidyate //
yaḥ kṣiptamanasā nityaṃ na ca dharmaparāyaṇaḥ /
teṣāṃ vṛthā sukhamidaṃ gacchati na nivartate //
ye tu tattvavido dhīrāḥ paśyanti jagataḥ sthitim /
tat sukhaṃ sāstravaṃ nityaṃ na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati //
tat sukhaṃ tadvitṛṣṇasya nīrāgasya hi dehinaḥ /
tat kiñcit sāsravaṃ saukhyaṃ tat sarva kṣaṇikaṃ matam /
rāgabandhād vinirmuktaṃ tat sarva niścalaṃ sukham //
ye na kṣipanti duḥkhena sukhe yeṣāṃ na saṅgatiḥ /
anupāyena ye mūḍhāḥ prārthayanti sukhaṃ sadā /
śakro 'pi tat sukhaṃ kartu yathā karma kṛtaṃ mahat //
sasukhaṃ yasya tu manaḥ saddharmānucaro bhavet /
nāhetukaṃ sukhaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ duḥkhaṃ vā trividhātmakam /
sukhe duḥkhe pṛthagbhāve tasmānnu sukṛta caret //
nedaṃ saukhyaṃ sadā śastamadhruvaṃ vipralopi ca /
tat saukhyaṃ (hi)satāṃ śastaṃ yatra mṛtyurna vidyate /
na ca priyeṇa viśleṣo nāpriyeṇa samāgamaḥ //
yat sukhaṃ duḥkhajanakaṃ kathaṃ tat sukhamiṣyate?
sa dhīmān suraloke ca gatvānyallabhate sukham //
bhuktaṃ sukhaṃ purāṇaṃ tu hīnakarma karoti ca /
purāṇaṃ sukṛtaṃ śīrṇa mṛtyukāle na budhyate //
nāśayitvā sukhaṃ sarva nāśayitvā ca jīvitam /
yadatīva sukhaṃ nṛṇāṃ taddhi saukhyāya kalpyate /
yannaiṣyati sukhaṃ kiñcit taddhi naiva vigaṇyate //
yad sukhaṃ triṣu lokeṣu na śastaṃ tattvadarśibhiḥ /
tena matvā kathaṃ devā bhavanti vigatajvarāḥ? //
atiyāti sukhaṃ sarva kriyatāṃ śraiyasaṃ manaḥ /
mā paścāt saṃbhavo yoge mṛtyukālo bhaviṣyati //
sukhī bhavati tat prāpya na sukhaṃ bhavajanmanaḥ /
yatra duḥkhaṃ vipākaṃ syāt tat sukhaṃ duḥkhameva tat //
mitraṃ bhavati tannṛṇāṃ na mitraṃ pāpakārakam //
taddoṣāt sadṛśo dṛṣṭaḥ śubho vā yadi vāśubhaḥ //
yaśasā yujyate yo hi nityaṃ sādhusamāgamāt /
sādhubhiśca sadā vāso duṣṭāṇāṃ ca vivarjanam //
na māninaṃ kusīdaṃ vā nityaṃ sarvānuśaṅkinam /
uttamaṃ bhajamānasya na doṣebhyo bhayaṃ bhavet //
bhayapradaṃ taṃ mātaṅgaḥ prayāntaṃ naiva paśyati //
rūpaiśvaryakulārthā ye na te tattvasya bhāginaḥ /
yeṣāṃ jñānaṃ ca śīlaṃ ca te kule mahati sthitāḥ //
saṃyuktā ye kulīnāste ye na dharmavivarjitāḥ //
tasmātkulaṃ jñānamayaṃ jñānahīnaṃ na tat kulam //
niyataṃ yaḥ karaṃ kāle dharmeṇa paribhujyate /
sa mahīṃ pālayettvenāṃ loke hi śreṣṭhatāṃ gataḥ //
baddhadarśī mahātmā yo gurupūjaka eva ca /
na ca hiṃsati bhūtāni sa deveṣūpapadyate //
sa matvāryāṃ mahīṃ kṛtsnāṃ devalokaṃ mahīyate //
na strīṇāṃ vaśago rājā sādhūnāṃ ca vaset sadā /
na sarvasya vacogrāhī priyaḥ sādhujanasya tu /
sa śuddha eva vimalo yāmānāmadhipo bhavet //
pravijitya mahīṃ kṛtsnāṃ pretya devapriyo bhavet //
priyasya tu bhaved vākyaṃ stotrotsavakaraṃ param /
hrāsavṛddhī ca bhūtānāmakasmāt kurute hi yaḥ /
sa rājā vai paro devairdevaloke ca tiṣṭhati //
kālaṃ niyatadarśī yaḥ prajānāṃ ca hite rataḥ /
nāśayitvā sa doṣaughān pretya svargeṣu jāyate //
sa mitraiḥ samparivṛto nṛpo devādhipo bhavet //
na śaktaḥ pānabhojyeṣu saṃsaktastu śubhe sadā /
yaste prakurute dharmān sa surādhipatāṃ vrajet //
yo devatāṃ pūjayati yathā cāhni mahīpatiḥ /
sa śīlavān divaṃ yāti nityaṃ śīlena rakṣitaḥ //
sa śīlavān divaṃ yāti nityaṃ śīlena rakṣitaḥ //
praśāsti ca mahīṃ kṛtsnāṃ yāmānāmadhipo bhavet //

body.p:
ye ca dharmā hetubhavā teṣāṃ tathāgato 'vadat /
teṣāṃ ca yo nirodhaścaivaṃvādīmahāśramaṇaḥ //

puṇyamavāptamantrakleśaṃ vibhidyājanavalāśrīkam /
yāvajjagadvyākulaṃ tarkaniṣṭhaiḥ samākulaṃ vetti satyavacanaiḥ //
mohāśivādirahitasya vākyavidyasya vipulārjanasya 'dharmasamuccayo' nāma dharmaparyāyaḥ samāptaḥ /
